00182 void read_fields(int imon,int itts)
00183 {
00184 
00185     /* Read ocmip gas exchange parameter fields */
00186     int i,j;
00187     int err, cdfid, timeid;
00188     char infile[25], inpath[200];
00189     FILE *file;
00190     int status;
00191     
00192     int xkwid, ficeid, atmpid;
00193     
00194     size_t start[MAX_NC_VARS];
00195     size_t count[MAX_NC_VARS];
00196     
00197     float** tmp2d;
00198     int inxt,iprv;
00199     double fact0,fact1,fact2;
00200     float** tmp2dp;
00201     float** tmp2dn;
00202 
00203     if (imon==11) {
00204         inxt = 0;
00205         iprv = 10;
00206     } else if (imon==0) {
00207         inxt = 1;
00208         iprv = 11;
00209     } else {
00210         inxt = imon + 1;
00211         iprv = imon - 1;
00212     }
00213 //  calculate weight factors for input files - fact0 for previous month, 
00214 //   fact1 for imon, fact2 for next month
00215     fact1 = 0.5 + ((2.0*(double)itts-1.0) / (2.0*(double)NTSTEP));
00216     if (fact1 <= 1.0) {
00217         fact0 = 1.0 - fact1;
00218         fact2 = 0.0;
00219     } else {
00220         fact0 = 0.0;
00221         fact2 = fact1 - 1.0;
00222         fact1 = 2.0 - fact1;
00223     }
00224 
00225   printf("Reading OCMIP gasex fields: \n"); 
00226   sprintf(infile,"gasx_ocmip2_himgrid.nc");
00227 
00228   strcpy(inpath, directory);
00229   strcat(inpath, infile);
00230 
00231   err = open_input_file(inpath,&file,&cdfid,&timeid);
00232   if (err != 0) {
00233     strcat(inpath, ".cdf");
00234     err = open_input_file(inpath,&file,&cdfid,&timeid);
00235     if (err != 0) {
00236       printf("Unable to find ocmip gasex file.\n");
00237      exit(-73);
00238     }
00239   }
00240 
00241         printf("read gasex month=%i\n",imon);
00242 
00243    if ((status = nc_inq_varid(cdfid, "OCMIP_FICE", &ficeid)))
00244       ERR(status);
00245    if ((status = nc_inq_varid(cdfid, "OCMIP_XKW", &xkwid)))
00246       ERR(status);
00247    if ((status = nc_inq_varid(cdfid, "OCMIP_ATMP", &atmpid)))
00248       ERR(status);
00249 
00250         bzero(start, MAX_NC_VARS * sizeof(long));
00251 
00252         count[0] = 1; 
00253         count[1] = NYTOT; 
00254         count[2] = NXTOT;
00255 
00256         tmp2d = alloc2d_f(NYTOT, NXTOT);
00257         tmp2dp = alloc2d_f(NYTOT, NXTOT);
00258         tmp2dn = alloc2d_f(NYTOT, NXTOT);
00259         start[0] = imon;
00260         if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,atmpid,start,count,tmp2d[0])))
00261             ERR(status);
00262         start[0] = iprv;
00263         if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,atmpid,start,count,tmp2dp[0])))
00264             ERR(status);
00265         start[0] = inxt;
00266         if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,atmpid,start,count,tmp2dn[0])))
00267             ERR(status);
00268         for (i=0;i<NXTOT;i++)
00269             for (j=0;j<NYTOT;j++)
00270                 atmpres[i+2][j+2]= fact1 * tmp2d[j][i] +
00271                         fact0 * tmp2dp[j][i] + fact2 * tmp2dn[j][i];
00272 
00273         start[0] = imon;
00274         if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,ficeid,start,count,tmp2d[0])))
00275             ERR(status);
00276         start[0] = iprv;
00277         if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,ficeid,start,count,tmp2dp[0])))
00278             ERR(status);
00279         start[0] = inxt;
00280         if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,ficeid,start,count,tmp2dn[0])))
00281             ERR(status);
00282         for (i=0;i<NXTOT;i++)
00283             for (j=0;j<NYTOT;j++)
00284                 fice[i+2][j+2]= fact1 * tmp2d[j][i] +
00285                         fact0 * tmp2dp[j][i] + fact2 * tmp2dn[j][i];
00286 
00287         start[0] = imon;
00288         if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,xkwid,start,count,tmp2d[0])))
00289             ERR(status);
00290         start[0] = iprv;
00291         if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,xkwid,start,count,tmp2dp[0])))
00292             ERR(status);
00293         start[0] = inxt;
00294         if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,xkwid,start,count,tmp2dn[0])))
00295             ERR(status);
00296         for (i=0;i<NXTOT;i++)
00297             for (j=0;j<NYTOT;j++)
00298                 xkw[i+2][j+2]= fact1 * tmp2d[j][i] +
00299                         fact0 * tmp2dp[j][i] + fact2 * tmp2dn[j][i];
00300 
00301         free2d_f(tmp2dp, NYTOT);
00302         free2d_f(tmp2dn, NYTOT);
00303         free2d_f(tmp2d, NYTOT);
00304 //BX  temporary bug fix for northern-most row (j=211)
00305  for (i=2;i<=NXMEM;i++) {
00306      atmpres[i][211] = atmpres[i][210];
00307      fice[i][211]    = fice[i][210];
00308      xkw[i][211]     = xkw[i][210];
00309  }
00310  close_file(&cdfid,&file);
00311 }

00317 void read_grid()
00318 {
00319   int err, i, j, cdfid, timeid;
00320   int status, varid; // HF
00321   char infile[25], inpath[200];
00322   FILE *file;
00323   double latq[NYTOT];
00324   double lath[NYTOT];
00325   double Ah[NYTOT][NXTOT];
00326   //HF
00327   double dxh_in[NYTOT][NXTOT], dxq_in[NYTOT][NXTOT];
00328   double dxu_in[NYTOT][NXTOT], dxv_in[NYTOT][NXTOT];
00329   double dyh_in[NYTOT][NXTOT], dyq_in[NYTOT][NXTOT];
00330   double dyu_in[NYTOT][NXTOT], dyv_in[NYTOT][NXTOT];
00331 
00332   long  start[MAX_NC_VARS];
00333   long  end[MAX_NC_VARS];
00334 
00335   sprintf(infile,"metrics.nc");
00336 
00337   strcpy(inpath, directory);
00338   strcat(inpath, infile);
00339   printf("\nLooking for file '%s'.\n",inpath);
00340 
00341   err = open_input_file(inpath,&file,&cdfid,&timeid);
00342   if (err != 0) {
00343     strcat(inpath, ".cdf");
00344     err = open_input_file(inpath,&file,&cdfid,&timeid);
00345     if (err != 0) {
00346       printf("Unable to find grid file.\n");
00347      exit(-73);
00348     }
00349   }
00350 
00351    end[0] = NYTOT;   
00352    end[1] = NXTOT;
00353 
00354    //HF
00355    status = nc_inq_varid(cdfid, "latq", &varid);
00356    if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("inq latq", status);
00357    status = nc_get_vara_double(cdfid, varid, start, end, latq);
00358    if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("read latq", status);
00359    //BX-a  ncvarget(cdfid, 2, start, end, latq);
00360 
00361    //CAD should these loop indices be hardwired (to i=0;i<NYTOT) ?
00362    for (i=0;i<NYTOT;i++) {
00363      qlat[i+2]=(double)latq[i]; 
00364    }
00365 
00366    //HF ncvarget(cdfid, 2, start, end, lath);
00367    status = nc_inq_varid(cdfid, "lath", &varid);
00368    if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("inq lath", status);
00369    status = nc_get_vara_double(cdfid, varid, start, end, lath);
00370    if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("read lath", status);
00371 
00372    //CAD should these loop indices be hardwired (to i=0;i<NYTOT) ?
00373    for (i=0;i<NYTOT;i++) {
00374      hlat[i+2]=(double)lath[i]; 
00375    }
00376    //BX-e
00377 
00378    //   ncvarget(cdfid,10, start, end, dxv);
00379    status = nc_inq_varid(cdfid, "dxv", &varid);
00380    if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("inq dxv", status);
00381    status = nc_get_vara_double(cdfid, varid, start, end, &dxv_in[0][0]);
00382    if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("read dxv", status);
00383 
00384    //   ncvarget(cdfid,12, start, end, dyu);
00385    status = nc_inq_varid(cdfid, "dyu", &varid);
00386    if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("inq dyu", status);
00387    status = nc_get_vara_double(cdfid, varid, start, end, &dyu_in[0][0]);
00388    if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("read dyu", status);
00389 
00390    //HF     ncvarget(cdfid,13, start, end, Ah);
00391    status = nc_inq_varid(cdfid, "Ah", &varid);
00392    if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("inq Ah", status);
00393    status = nc_get_vara_double(cdfid, varid, start, end, &Ah[0][0]);
00394    if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("read Ah", status);
00395 
00396    //   ncvarget(cdfid,14, start, end, dyv);
00397    status = nc_inq_varid(cdfid, "dyv", &varid);
00398    if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("inq dyv", status);
00399    status = nc_get_vara_double(cdfid, varid, start, end, &dyv_in[0][0]);
00400    if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("read dyv", status);
00401 
00402    //   ncvarget(cdfid,15, start, end, dxh);
00403    status = nc_inq_varid(cdfid, "dxh", &varid);
00404    if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("inq dxh", status);
00405    status = nc_get_vara_double(cdfid, varid, start, end, &dxh_in[0][0]);
00406    if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("read dxh", status);
00407 
00408    //   ncvarget(cdfid,16, start, end, dyq);
00409    status = nc_inq_varid(cdfid, "dyq", &varid);
00410    if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("inq dyq", status);
00411    status = nc_get_vara_double(cdfid, varid, start, end, &dyq_in[0][0]);
00412    if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("read dyq", status);
00413 
00414    //   ncvarget(cdfid,17, start, end, dxq);
00415    status = nc_inq_varid(cdfid, "dxq", &varid);
00416    if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("inq dxq", status);
00417    status = nc_get_vara_double(cdfid, varid, start, end, &dxq_in[0][0]);
00418    if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("read dxq", status);
00419 
00420    //   ncvarget(cdfid,18, start, end, dyh);
00421    status = nc_inq_varid(cdfid, "dyh", &varid);
00422    if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("inq dyh", status);
00423    status = nc_get_vara_double(cdfid, varid, start, end, &dyh_in[0][0]);
00424    if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("read dyh", status);
00425 
00426    //   ncvarget(cdfid,19, start, end, dxu);
00427    status = nc_inq_varid(cdfid, "dxu", &varid);
00428    if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("inq dxu", status);
00429    status = nc_get_vara_double(cdfid, varid, start, end, &dxu_in[0][0]);
00430    if (status != NC_NOERR) handle_error("read dxu", status);
00431 
00432 
00433    for (i=0;i<NXTOT;i++) {
00434      for (j=0;j<NYTOT;j++) {
00435        areagr[i+2][j+2]= Ah[j][i];
00436        DXq(i+2,j+2) = dxq_in[j][i];
00437        DYq(i+2,j+2) = dyq_in[j][i];
00438        DXv(i+2,j+2) = dxv_in[j][i];
00439        DYv(i+2,j+2) = dyv_in[j][i];
00440        DXh(i+2,j+2) = dxh_in[j][i];
00441        DYh(i+2,j+2) = dyh_in[j][i];
00442        DXu(i+2,j+2) = dxu_in[j][i];
00443        DYu(i+2,j+2) = dyu_in[j][i];
00444      }
00445      // HF
00446      DXv(i+2,1) = DXv(i+2,2);
00447      DYv(i+2,1) = DYv(i+2,2);
00448      // HF-e
00449    }    
00450    
00451    close_file(&cdfid,&file);
00452    printf("\nFinished reading file '%s'.\n",inpath);
00453    
00454    
00455    /* zonal re-entrance            */
00456    
00457    for (j=0;j<=NYMEM-1;j++) {
00458      areagr[nx+1][j] = areagr[2][j];
00459      areagr[nx+2][j] = areagr[3][j];
00460      areagr[0][j] = areagr[nx-1][j];
00461      areagr[1][j] = areagr[nx][j];
00462 
00463      DXq(nx+1,j) = DXq(2,j);
00464      DXq(nx+2,j) = DXq(3,j);
00465      DXq(0,j) = DXq(nx-1,j);
00466      DXq(1,j) = DXq(nx,j);
00467 
00468      DYq(nx+1,j) = DYq(2,j);
00469      DYq(nx+2,j) = DYq(3,j);
00470      DYq(0,j) = DYq(nx-1,j);
00471      DYq(1,j) = DYq(nx,j);
00472 
00473      DXv(nx+1,j) = DXv(2,j);
00474      DXv(nx+2,j) = DXv(3,j);
00475      DXv(0,j) = DXv(nx-1,j);
00476      DXv(1,j) = DXv(nx,j);
00477 
00478      DYv(nx+1,j) = DYv(2,j);
00479      DYv(nx+2,j) = DYv(3,j);
00480      DYv(0,j) = DYv(nx-1,j);
00481      DYv(1,j) = DYv(nx,j);
00482 
00483      DXh(nx+1,j) = DXh(2,j);
00484      DXh(nx+2,j) = DXh(3,j);
00485      DXh(0,j) = DXh(nx-1,j);
00486      DXh(1,j) = DXh(nx,j);
00487 
00488      DYh(nx+1,j) = DYh(2,j);
00489      DYh(nx+2,j) = DYh(3,j);
00490      DYh(0,j) = DYh(nx-1,j);
00491      DYh(1,j) = DYh(nx,j);
00492 
00493      DXu(nx+1,j) = DXu(2,j);
00494      DXu(nx+2,j) = DXu(3,j);
00495      DXu(0,j) = DXu(nx-1,j);
00496      DXu(1,j) = DXu(nx,j);
00497 
00498      DYu(nx+1,j) = DYu(2,j);
00499      DYu(nx+2,j) = DYu(3,j);
00500      DYu(0,j) = DYu(nx-1,j);
00501      DYu(1,j) = DYu(nx,j);
00502    }
00503    
00504    /* meridional re-entrance            */
00505    
00506    for (i=2;i<=nx;i++) {
00507      int ii = 363 - i;
00508      areagr[ii][ny+1] = areagr[i][ny];
00509      areagr[ii][ny+2] = areagr[i][ny-1];
00510 
00511      DXq(ii,ny+1) = DXq(i,ny);
00512      DXq(ii,ny+2) = DXq(i,ny-1);
00513 
00514      DYq(ii,ny+1) = DYq(i,ny);
00515      DYq(ii,ny+2) = DYq(i,ny-1);
00516 
00517      DXv(ii,ny+1) = DXv(i,ny);
00518      DXv(ii,ny+2) = DXv(i,ny-1);
00519 
00520      DYv(ii,ny+1) = DYv(i,ny);
00521      DYv(ii,ny+2) = DYv(i,ny-1);
00522 
00523      DXh(ii,ny+1) = DXh(i,ny);
00524      DXh(ii,ny+2) = DXh(i,ny-1);
00525 
00526      DYh(ii,ny+1) = DYh(i,ny);
00527      DYh(ii,ny+2) = DYh(i,ny-1);
00528 
00529      DXu(ii,ny+1) = DXu(i,ny);
00530      DXu(ii,ny+2) = DXu(i,ny-1);
00531 
00532      DYu(ii,ny+1) = DYu(i,ny);
00533      DYu(ii,ny+2) = DYu(i,ny-1);
00534    }
00535    
00536 }
00537 
00538 void read_D()
00539 {
00540   int i,ii,j;
00541   int err, cdfid, timeid;
00542   char infile[25], inpath[200];
00543   FILE *file;
00544 
00545 /*  Read the depth and other data in from the saved binary files.     */
00546         
00547   sprintf(infile,"topo.nc");
00548 
00549   strcpy(inpath, directory);
00550   strcat(inpath, infile);
00551   printf("Looking for file '%s'.\n",inpath);
00552 
00553   err = open_input_file(inpath,&file,&cdfid,&timeid);
00554   if (err != 0) {
00555     strcat(inpath, ".cdf");
00556     err = open_input_file(inpath,&file,&cdfid,&timeid);
00557     if (err != 0) {
00558       printf("Unable to find depth file.\n");
00559      exit(-73);
00560     }
00561   }
00562 
00563   //HF  WARN read_field(cdfid,file,"D", NXTOT,NYTOT,1, 0,0,0, 1,1,0, 1, D[0]);
00564   read_field(cdfid,file,"D", NXTOT,NYTOT,1, 0,0,0, X1,Y1,0, 1, D[0]);
00565   close_file(&cdfid,&file);
00566 
00567 
00568   //HF10022009  zonal re-entrance
00569   for (j=0;j<=NYMEM-1;j++) {
00570     D[nx+1][j] = D[2][j];
00571     D[nx+2][j] = D[3][j];
00572     D[0][j] =   D[nx-1][j];
00573     D[1][j] =   D[nx][j];
00574   }
00575 
00576   //      meridional re-entrance
00577   for (i=0;i<=nx+2;i++) {
00578     ii = 363 - i;
00579     D[ii][ny+1] = D[i][ny];
00580     D[ii][ny+2] = D[i][ny-1];
00581   }
00582 }
00583 
00584 
00585 void read_clim(int imon, int inxt, int ilst)
00586 {
00587 
00588   int i,j,k;
00589   int ii;
00590   int err, cdfid, timeid;
00591   char infile[25], inpath[200];
00592   FILE *file;
00593   int status;
00594 
00595    int hclimid,uhclimid,vhclimid,wdclimid,pmeid;
00596 
00597    double PME[NYTOT][NXTOT];
00598 
00599    size_t start[MAX_NC_VARS];
00600    size_t count[MAX_NC_VARS];
00601 
00602    float*** tmp3d;
00603    float**  tmp2d;
00604 
00605   sprintf(infile,"oceanclim.nc");
00606 
00607   strcpy(inpath, directory);
00608   strcat(inpath, infile);
00609 
00610   err = open_input_file(inpath,&file,&cdfid,&timeid);
00611   if (err != 0) {
00612     strcat(inpath, ".cdf");
00613     err = open_input_file(inpath,&file,&cdfid,&timeid);
00614     if (err != 0) {
00615       printf("Unable to find oceanclim file.\n");
00616      exit(-73);
00617     }
00618   }
00619 
00620         printf("read_clim month=  %i\n",imon);
00621 
00622    if ((status = nc_inq_varid(cdfid, "HCLIM", &hclimid)))
00623       ERR(status);
00624    if ((status = nc_inq_varid(cdfid, "UHCLIM", &uhclimid)))
00625       ERR(status);
00626    if ((status = nc_inq_varid(cdfid, "VHCLIM", &vhclimid)))
00627       ERR(status);
00628    if ((status = nc_inq_varid(cdfid, "WDCLIM", &wdclimid)))
00629       ERR(status);
00630    if ((status = nc_inq_varid(cdfid, "PMECLIM", &pmeid)))
00631       ERR(status);
00632 
00633         bzero(start, MAX_NC_VARS * sizeof(long));
00634 
00635         count[0] = 1; 
00636         count[1] = NZ;
00637         count[2] = NYTOT; 
00638         count[3] = NXTOT;
00639 
00640         start[0] = ilst;
00641 
00642                 printf("1-start0=%i \n",start[0]);
00643 
00644         tmp3d = alloc3d_f(NZ+1,NYTOT,NXTOT);
00645 #ifndef USE_CALC_H
00646         if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,hclimid,start,count,tmp3d[0][0])))
00647             ERR(status);
00648         for (k=0;k<NZ;k++)
00649             for (i=0;i<NXTOT;i++)
00650                 for (j=0;j<NYTOT;j++)
00651                     h[k][i+2][j+2]= tmp3d[k][j][i];  
00652 #else
00653         printf("not reading hclim, h: %g\n", h[0][50][50]);
00654 #endif
00655 
00656         start[0] = imon;
00657 
00658                 printf("2-start0=%d\n",start[0]);
00659 
00660         if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,uhclimid,start,count,tmp3d[0][0])))
00661             ERR(status);
00662         for (k=0;k<NZ;k++)
00663             for (i=0;i<NXTOT;i++)
00664                 for (j=0;j<NYTOT;j++)
00665                     uhtm[k][i+2][j+2]= tmp3d[k][j][i];
00666         if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,vhclimid,start,count,tmp3d[0][0])))
00667             ERR(status);
00668         for (k=0;k<NZ;k++)
00669             for (i=0;i<NXTOT;i++)
00670                 for (j=0;j<NYTOT;j++)
00671                     vhtm[k][i+2][j+2]= tmp3d[k][j][i];
00672 
00673          printf("read_clim next month=%i\n",inxt);
00674 
00675          start[0] = inxt;
00676          if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,hclimid,start,count,&tmp3d[0][0][0])))
00677              ERR(status);
00678 
00679          for (k=0;k<NZ;k++)
00680              for (i=0;i<NXTOT;i++)
00681                  for (j=0;j<NYTOT;j++)
00682                      hend[k][i+2][j+2]= tmp3d[k][j][i];
00683 
00684 
00685          count[1] = NZ+1;
00686          start[0] = imon;
00687          if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,wdclimid,start,count,tmp3d[0][0])))
00688              ERR(status);
00689 
00690          for (k=0;k<NZ+1;k++) 
00691           for (i=0;i<NXTOT;i++) 
00692            for (j=0;j<NYTOT;j++)  
00693              wd[k][i+2][j+2]= dt * tmp3d[k][j][i];
00694 
00695         tmp2d = alloc2d_f(NYTOT, NXTOT);
00696 
00697         count[0] = 1; 
00698         start[0]= imon; 
00699         count[1] = NYTOT; 
00700         start[1]=0;
00701         count[2] = NXTOT; 
00702         start[2]=0;
00703 
00704          if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,pmeid,start,count,tmp2d[0])))
00705              ERR(status);
00706 
00707           for (i=0;i<NXTOT;i++)
00708            for (j=0;j<NYTOT;j++)
00709              wd[0][i+2][j+2]= dt *  tmp2d[j][i];
00710 
00711          printf("dt=%g,imon=%i,inxt=%i\n",dt,imon,inxt);
00712         
00713          free3d_f(tmp3d, NZ);
00714          free2d_f(tmp2d,NYTOT);
00715 
00716 //      zonal re-entrance
00717  for (k=0;k<NZ;k++) {
00718      for (j=0;j<=NYMEM-1;j++) {
00719          h[k][nx+1][j] = h[k][2][j];
00720          h[k][nx+2][j] = h[k][3][j];
00721          h[k][0][j] =   h[k][nx-1][j];
00722          h[k][1][j] =   h[k][nx][j];
00723          hend[k][nx+1][j] = hend[k][2][j];
00724          hend[k][nx+2][j] = hend[k][3][j];
00725          hend[k][0][j] =   hend[k][nx-1][j];
00726          hend[k][1][j] =   hend[k][nx][j];
00727      }
00728  }
00729 
00730 //      meridional re-entrance
00731     for (i=2;i<=nx;i++) {
00732       ii = 363 - i;
00733       for (k=0;k<NZ;k++) {
00734         h[k][ii][ny+1] = h[k][i][ny];
00735         h[k][ii][ny+2]   = h[k][i][ny-1];
00736         hend[k][ii][ny+1] = hend[k][i][ny];
00737         hend[k][ii][ny+2] = hend[k][i][ny-1];   
00738       }
00739     }
00740 
00741     close_file(&cdfid,&file);
00742 }
00743 
00744 void read_uvw(int imon,int itts)
00745 {
00746 
00747     int i,j,k;
00748     int err, cdfid, timeid;
00749     char infile[25], inpath[200];
00750     FILE *file;
00751     int status;
00752     int inxt,iprv;
00753     double fact0,fact1,fact2;
00754 
00755     int uhclimid,vhclimid,wdclimid;
00756 
00757     size_t start[MAX_NC_VARS];
00758     size_t count[MAX_NC_VARS];
00759 
00760     float*** tmp3d;
00761     float*** tmp3dp;
00762     float*** tmp3dn;
00763 
00764 # ifdef SEPFILES
00765     if (imon==NMONTHS-1) {
00766         inxt = 0;
00767         iprv = imon - 1;
00768     } else if (imon==0) {
00769         inxt = 1;
00770         iprv = NMONTHS-1;
00771     } else {
00772         inxt = imon + 1;
00773         iprv = imon - 1;
00774     }
00775 # else
00776     if (imon==11) {
00777         inxt = 0;
00778         iprv = 10;
00779     } else if (imon==0) {
00780         inxt = 1;
00781         iprv = 11;
00782     } else {
00783         inxt = imon + 1;
00784         iprv = imon - 1;
00785     }
00786 # endif
00787     printf("READ_UVW: iprv=  %i, imon= %i, inxt= %i\n",iprv,imon,inxt);
00788 
00789 
00790 //  calculate weight factors for input files - fact0 for previous month, 
00791 //   fact1 for imon, fact2 for next month
00792     fact1 = 0.5 + ((2.0*(double)itts-1.0) / (2.0*(double)NTSTEP));
00793     if (fact1 <= 1.0) {
00794         fact0 = 1.0 - fact1;
00795         fact2 = 0.0;
00796     } else {
00797         fact0 = 0.0;
00798         fact2 = fact1 - 1.0;
00799         fact1 = 2.0 - fact1;
00800     }
00801     printf("READ_UVW; facts are %g, %g, %g.\n",fact0,fact1,fact2);
00802 
00803 # ifdef SEPFILES
00804 //
00805 //   read in separate files for U, V, and W
00806 //
00807 //    Start with uhtm
00808 #  ifdef VARIAB_FORC
00809     sprintf(infile,"UH.nc");
00810 #  else
00811     sprintf(infile,"UH-clim.nc");
00812 #  endif
00813     strcpy(inpath, directory);
00814     strcat(inpath, infile);
00815 
00816 //    printf("Looking for file '%s'.\n",inpath);
00817 
00818     err = open_input_file(inpath,&file,&cdfid,&timeid);
00819     if (err != 0) {
00820         strcat(inpath, ".cdf");
00821         err = open_input_file(inpath,&file,&cdfid,&timeid);
00822         if (err != 0) {
00823             printf("Unable to find UH file.\n");
00824             exit(-73);
00825         }
00826     }
00827     
00828 #  ifdef VARIAB_FORC
00829     if ((status = nc_inq_varid(cdfid, "UH", &uhclimid)))
00830         ERR(status);
00831 #  else
00832     if ((status = nc_inq_varid(cdfid, "UHCLIM", &uhclimid)))
00833         ERR(status);
00834 #  endif
00835     //    if ((status = nc_inq_varid(cdfid, "UHCLIM", &uhclimid)))
00836     //if ((status = nc_inq_varid(cdfid, "UH", &uhclimid)))
00837     //   ERR(status);
00838     
00839     bzero(start, MAX_NC_VARS * sizeof(long));
00840 
00841     count[0] = 1; 
00842     count[1] = NZ;
00843     count[2] = NYTOT; 
00844     count[3] = NXTOT;
00845     
00846 #  ifdef VARIAB_FORC
00847     printf("read UH month=  %i\n",imon);
00848 #  else
00849     printf("read_clim UH month=  %i\n",imon);
00850 #  endif
00851 
00852 // allocate NZ+1 so that it can be used for WDCLIM as well
00853     tmp3d  = alloc3d_f(NZ+1,NYTOT,NXTOT);
00854     tmp3dn = alloc3d_f(NZ+1,NYTOT,NXTOT);
00855     tmp3dp = alloc3d_f(NZ+1,NYTOT,NXTOT);
00856 
00857     start[0] = imon;
00858     if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,uhclimid,start,count,tmp3d[0][0])))
00859        ERR(status);
00860     //printf("read_clim UH month=  %i done\n",imon);
00861 //    start[0] = iprv;
00862 //    if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,uhclimid,start,count,tmp3dp[0][0])))
00863 //       ERR(status);
00864     //printf("read_clim UH month=  %i done\n",iprv);
00865 //    start[0] = inxt;
00866 //    if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,uhclimid,start,count,tmp3dn[0][0])))
00867 //       ERR(status);
00868     //printf("read_clim UH month=  %i done\n",inxt);
00869 
00870     for (k=0;k<NZ;k++)
00871         for (i=0;i<NXTOT;i++)
00872             for (j=0;j<NYTOT;j++)
00873                 uhtm[k][i+2][j+2]= tmp3d[k][j][i];
00874 //uhtm[k][i+2][j+2]= fact1 * tmp3d[k][j][i] +
00875 //    fact0 * tmp3dp[k][j][i] + fact2 * tmp3dn[k][j][i];
00876 
00877     close_file(&cdfid,&file);
00878     //printf("READ uhtm=%g;%g,%g,%g\n",uhtm[0][190][26],tmp3d[0][24][188],
00879     //     tmp3dp[0][24][188],tmp3dn[0][24][188]);
00880 
00881 //    Next vhtm
00882 #  ifdef VARIAB_FORC
00883     sprintf(infile,"VH.nc");
00884 #  else
00885     sprintf(infile,"VH-clim.nc");
00886 #  endif
00887 
00888     strcpy(inpath, directory);
00889     strcat(inpath, infile);
00890 
00891 //  printf("Looking for file '%s'.\n",inpath);
00892 
00893     err = open_input_file(inpath,&file,&cdfid,&timeid);
00894     if (err != 0) {
00895         strcat(inpath, ".cdf");
00896         err = open_input_file(inpath,&file,&cdfid,&timeid);
00897         if (err != 0) {
00898             printf("Unable to find VH file.\n");
00899             exit(-73);
00900         }
00901     }
00902     
00903 #  ifdef VARIAB_FORC
00904     if ((status = nc_inq_varid(cdfid, "VH", &vhclimid)))
00905         ERR(status);
00906 #  else
00907     if ((status = nc_inq_varid(cdfid, "VHCLIM", &vhclimid)))
00908         ERR(status);
00909 #  endif
00910     //    if ((status = nc_inq_varid(cdfid, "VHCLIM", &vhclimid)))
00911     //if ((status = nc_inq_varid(cdfid, "VH", &vhclimid)))
00912     //   ERR(status);
00913     
00914     bzero(start, MAX_NC_VARS * sizeof(long));
00915 
00916     count[0] = 1; 
00917     count[1] = NZ;
00918     count[2] = NYTOT; 
00919     count[3] = NXTOT;
00920     
00921 #  ifdef VARIAB_FORC
00922     printf("read VH month=  %i\n",imon);
00923 #  else
00924     printf("read_clim VH month=  %i\n",imon);
00925 #  endif
00926 
00927     start[0] = imon;
00928     if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,vhclimid,start,count,tmp3d[0][0])))
00929        ERR(status);
00930 //    start[0] = iprv;
00931 //    if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,vhclimid,start,count,tmp3dp[0][0])))
00932 //       ERR(status);
00933 //    start[0] = inxt;
00934 //    if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,vhclimid,start,count,tmp3dn[0][0])))
00935 //         ERR(status);
00936 
00937     for (k=0;k<NZ;k++)
00938         for (i=0;i<NXTOT;i++)
00939             for (j=0;j<NYTOT;j++)
00940                 vhtm[k][i+2][j+2]= tmp3d[k][j][i];
00941 //vhtm[k][i+2][j+2]= fact1 * tmp3d[k][j][i] +
00942 //    fact0 * tmp3dp[k][j][i] + fact2 * tmp3dn[k][j][i];
00943 
00944     close_file(&cdfid,&file);
00945 
00946 // finally wd
00947 #  ifdef VARIAB_FORC
00948     sprintf(infile,"WD.nc");
00949 #  else
00950     sprintf(infile,"WD-clim.nc");
00951 #  endif
00952 
00953     strcpy(inpath, directory);
00954     strcat(inpath, infile);
00955 
00956 //  printf("Looking for file '%s'.\n",inpath);
00957 
00958     err = open_input_file(inpath,&file,&cdfid,&timeid);
00959     if (err != 0) {
00960         strcat(inpath, ".cdf");
00961         err = open_input_file(inpath,&file,&cdfid,&timeid);
00962         if (err != 0) {
00963             printf("Unable to find WD file.\n");
00964             exit(-73);
00965         }
00966     }
00967     
00968 #  ifdef VARIAB_FORC
00969     if ((status = nc_inq_varid(cdfid, "WD", &wdclimid)))
00970         ERR(status);
00971 #  else
00972     if ((status = nc_inq_varid(cdfid, "WDCLIM", &wdclimid)))
00973         ERR(status);
00974 #  endif
00975     //    if ((status = nc_inq_varid(cdfid, "WDCLIM", &wdclimid)))
00976     //if ((status = nc_inq_varid(cdfid, "WD", &wdclimid)))
00977     //   ERR(status);
00978     
00979     bzero(start, MAX_NC_VARS * sizeof(long));
00980 
00981     count[0] = 1; 
00982     count[1] = NZ;
00983     count[2] = NYTOT; 
00984     count[3] = NXTOT;
00985     
00986 #  ifdef VARIAB_FORC
00987     printf("read WD month=  %i\n",imon);
00988 #  else
00989     printf("read_clim WD month=  %i\n",imon);
00990 #  endif
00991 
00992     count[1] = NZ+1;
00993     start[0] = imon;
00994     if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,wdclimid,start,count,tmp3d[0][0])))
00995        ERR(status);
00996 //    start[0] = iprv;
00997 //    if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,wdclimid,start,count,tmp3dp[0][0])))
00998 //       ERR(status);
00999 //    start[0] = inxt;
01000 //    if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,wdclimid,start,count,tmp3dn[0][0])))
01001 //       ERR(status);
01002 
01003     for (k=0;k<NZ+1;k++)
01004         for (i=0;i<NXTOT;i++)
01005             for (j=0;j<NYTOT;j++)
01006                 wd[k][i+2][j+2]= dt * tmp3d[k][j][i];
01007 //wd[k][i+2][j+2]= dt * (fact1 * tmp3d[k][j][i] +
01008 //    fact0 * tmp3dp[k][j][i] + fact2 * tmp3dn[k][j][i]);
01009 
01010     //BX-a
01011     // take out PME which is read in onto wd[0][i][j]
01012     //for (i=0;i<NXTOT;i++)
01013     //  for (j=0;j<NYTOT;j++)
01014     //      wd[k][i+2][j+2]= 0;
01015     //    printf("ATTENTION: EmP is set to 0. for this run.\n");
01016     //BX-e
01017 
01018 
01019     free3d_f(tmp3d, NZ);
01020     free3d_f(tmp3dp, NZ);
01021     free3d_f(tmp3dn, NZ);
01022 
01023 
01024     close_file(&cdfid,&file);
01025 # else     //  SEPFILES
01026     sprintf(infile,"oceanclim.nc");
01027 
01028     strcpy(inpath, directory);
01029     strcat(inpath, infile);
01030 
01031 //  printf("Looking for file '%s'.\n",inpath);
01032 
01033     err = open_input_file(inpath,&file,&cdfid,&timeid);
01034     if (err != 0) {
01035         strcat(inpath, ".cdf");
01036         err = open_input_file(inpath,&file,&cdfid,&timeid);
01037         if (err != 0) {
01038             printf("Unable to find oceanclim file.\n");
01039             exit(-73);
01040         }
01041     }
01042     
01043     if ((status = nc_inq_varid(cdfid, "UHCLIM", &uhclimid)))
01044         ERR(status);
01045     if ((status = nc_inq_varid(cdfid, "VHCLIM", &vhclimid)))
01046         ERR(status);
01047     if ((status = nc_inq_varid(cdfid, "WDCLIM", &wdclimid)))
01048         ERR(status);
01049     
01050     bzero(start, MAX_NC_VARS * sizeof(long));
01051 
01052     count[0] = 1; 
01053     count[1] = NZ;
01054     count[2] = NYTOT; 
01055     count[3] = NXTOT;
01056     
01057     printf("read_clim month=  %i\n",imon);
01058 
01059 // allocate NZ+1 so that it can be used for WDCLIM as well
01060     tmp3d  = alloc3d_f(NZ+1,NYTOT,NXTOT);
01061     tmp3dn = alloc3d_f(NZ+1,NYTOT,NXTOT);
01062     tmp3dp = alloc3d_f(NZ+1,NYTOT,NXTOT);
01063 
01064 //    Start with uhtm
01065     start[0] = imon;
01066     if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,uhclimid,start,count,tmp3d[0][0])))
01067         ERR(status);
01068     start[0] = iprv;
01069     if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,uhclimid,start,count,tmp3dp[0][0])))
01070         ERR(status);
01071     start[0] = inxt;
01072     if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,uhclimid,start,count,tmp3dn[0][0])))
01073         ERR(status);
01074 
01075     for (k=0;k<NZ;k++)
01076         for (i=0;i<NXTOT;i++)
01077             for (j=0;j<NYTOT;j++)
01078                 uhtm[k][i+2][j+2]= fact1 * tmp3d[k][j][i] +
01079                     fact0 * tmp3dp[k][j][i] + fact2 * tmp3dn[k][j][i];
01080 
01081 //    Next vhtm
01082     start[0] = imon;
01083     if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,vhclimid,start,count,tmp3d[0][0])))
01084         ERR(status);
01085     start[0] = iprv;
01086     if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,vhclimid,start,count,tmp3dp[0][0])))
01087         ERR(status);
01088     start[0] = inxt;
01089     if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,vhclimid,start,count,tmp3dn[0][0])))
01090         ERR(status);
01091 
01092     for (k=0;k<NZ;k++)
01093         for (i=0;i<NXTOT;i++)
01094             for (j=0;j<NYTOT;j++)
01095                 vhtm[k][i+2][j+2]= fact1 * tmp3d[k][j][i] +
01096                     fact0 * tmp3dp[k][j][i] + fact2 * tmp3dn[k][j][i];
01097 
01098 // finally wd
01099     count[1] = NZ+1;
01100     start[0] = imon;
01101     if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,wdclimid,start,count,tmp3d[0][0])))
01102         ERR(status);
01103     start[0] = iprv;
01104     if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,wdclimid,start,count,tmp3dp[0][0])))
01105         ERR(status);
01106     start[0] = inxt;
01107     if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,wdclimid,start,count,tmp3dn[0][0])))
01108         ERR(status);
01109 
01110     for (k=0;k<NZ+1;k++)
01111         for (i=0;i<NXTOT;i++)
01112             for (j=0;j<NYTOT;j++)
01113                 wd[k][i+2][j+2]= dt * (fact1 * tmp3d[k][j][i] +
01114                     fact0 * tmp3dp[k][j][i] + fact2 * tmp3dn[k][j][i]);
01115 
01116     free3d_f(tmp3d, NZ);
01117     free3d_f(tmp3dp, NZ);
01118     free3d_f(tmp3dn, NZ);
01119 
01120     close_file(&cdfid,&file);
01121 # endif    //  SEPFILES
01122 }
01123 
01124 void read_h(int imon,int inxt) 
01125 {
01126 
01127   int i,j,k;
01128   int ii;
01129   int err, cdfid, timeid;
01130   char infile[25], inpath[200];
01131   FILE *file;
01132   int status;
01133 
01134    int hclimid;
01135 
01136    size_t start[MAX_NC_VARS];
01137    size_t count[MAX_NC_VARS];
01138 
01139    float*** tmp3d;
01140 
01141 # ifdef SEPFILES
01142 #  ifdef VARIAB_FORC
01143    sprintf(infile,"H.nc");
01144 #  else
01145    sprintf(infile,"H-clim.nc");
01146 #  endif
01147 
01148   strcpy(inpath, directory);
01149   strcat(inpath, infile);
01150 
01151 //  printf("Looking for file '%s'.\n",inpath);
01152 
01153   err = open_input_file(inpath,&file,&cdfid,&timeid);
01154   if (err != 0) {
01155     strcat(inpath, ".cdf");
01156     err = open_input_file(inpath,&file,&cdfid,&timeid);
01157     if (err != 0) {
01158       printf("Unable to find H oceanclim file.\n");
01159      exit(-73);
01160     }
01161   }
01162 
01163 #  ifdef VARIAB_FORC
01164         printf("read_h H month=  %i\n",imon);
01165 #  else
01166         printf("read_hclim H month=  %i\n",imon);
01167 #  endif
01168 
01169 #  ifdef VARIAB_FORC
01170    if ((status = nc_inq_varid(cdfid, "H", &hclimid)))
01171       ERR(status);
01172 #  else
01173    if ((status = nc_inq_varid(cdfid, "HCLIM", &hclimid)))
01174       ERR(status);
01175 #  endif
01176         //   if ((status = nc_inq_varid(cdfid, "HCLIM", &hclimid)))
01177    //if ((status = nc_inq_varid(cdfid, "H", &hclimid)))
01178    //   ERR(status);
01179 
01180         bzero(start, MAX_NC_VARS * sizeof(long));
01181 
01182         count[0] = 1; 
01183         count[1] = NZ;
01184         count[2] = NYTOT; 
01185         count[3] = NXTOT;
01186 
01187         start[0] = imon;
01188 // allocate NZ+1 so that it can be used for WDCLIM as well
01189         tmp3d = alloc3d_f(NZ+1,NYTOT,NXTOT);
01190         if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,hclimid,start,count,tmp3d[0][0])))
01191             ERR(status);
01192         for (k=0;k<NZ;k++) {
01193             for (i=0;i<NXTOT;i++) {
01194                 for (j=0;j<NYTOT;j++) {
01195                     h[k][i+2][j+2]= tmp3d[k][j][i];  
01196                     hstart[k][i+2][j+2]= tmp3d[k][j][i];  
01197                 }
01198             }
01199         }
01200 
01201 #  ifdef VARIAB_FORC
01202          printf("read_h H next month=%i\n",inxt);
01203 #  else
01204          printf("read_hclim H next month=%i\n",inxt);
01205 #  endif
01206 
01207          start[0] = inxt;
01208          if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,hclimid,start,count,&tmp3d[0][0][0])))
01209              ERR(status);
01210 
01211          for (k=0;k<NZ;k++)
01212              for (i=0;i<NXTOT;i++)
01213                  for (j=0;j<NYTOT;j++)
01214                      hend[k][i+2][j+2]= tmp3d[k][j][i];
01215 
01216 # else   //   SEPFILES
01217   sprintf(infile,"oceanclim.nc");
01218 
01219   strcpy(inpath, directory);
01220   strcat(inpath, infile);
01221 
01222 //  printf("Looking for file '%s'.\n",inpath);
01223 
01224   err = open_input_file(inpath,&file,&cdfid,&timeid);
01225   if (err != 0) {
01226     strcat(inpath, ".cdf");
01227     err = open_input_file(inpath,&file,&cdfid,&timeid);
01228     if (err != 0) {
01229       printf("Unable to find oceanclim file.\n");
01230      exit(-73);
01231     }
01232   }
01233 
01234         printf("read_hclim month=  %i\n",imon);
01235 
01236    if ((status = nc_inq_varid(cdfid, "HCLIM", &hclimid)))
01237       ERR(status);
01238 
01239         bzero(start, MAX_NC_VARS * sizeof(long));
01240 
01241         count[0] = 1; 
01242         count[1] = NZ;
01243         count[2] = NYTOT; 
01244         count[3] = NXTOT;
01245 
01246         start[0] = imon;
01247 // allocate NZ+1 so that it can be used for WDCLIM as well
01248         tmp3d = alloc3d_f(NZ+1,NYTOT,NXTOT);
01249         if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,hclimid,start,count,tmp3d[0][0])))
01250             ERR(status);
01251         for (k=0;k<NZ;k++) {
01252             for (i=0;i<NXTOT;i++) {
01253                 for (j=0;j<NYTOT;j++) {
01254                     h[k][i+2][j+2]= tmp3d[k][j][i];  
01255                     hstart[k][i+2][j+2]= tmp3d[k][j][i];  
01256                 }
01257             }
01258         }
01259 
01260          printf("read_hclim next month=%i\n",inxt);
01261 
01262          start[0] = inxt;
01263          if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,hclimid,start,count,&tmp3d[0][0][0])))
01264              ERR(status);
01265 
01266          for (k=0;k<NZ;k++)
01267              for (i=0;i<NXTOT;i++)
01268                  for (j=0;j<NYTOT;j++)
01269                      hend[k][i+2][j+2]= tmp3d[k][j][i];
01270 
01271 # endif   //   SEPFILES
01272          free3d_f(tmp3d, NZ);
01273 
01274 
01275 //      zonal re-entrance
01276  for (k=0;k<NZ;k++) {
01277      for (j=0;j<=NYMEM-1;j++) {
01278          h[k][nx+1][j] = h[k][2][j];
01279          h[k][nx+2][j] = h[k][3][j];
01280          h[k][0][j] =   h[k][nx-1][j];
01281          h[k][1][j] =   h[k][nx][j];
01282          hstart[k][nx+1][j] = hstart[k][2][j];
01283          hstart[k][nx+2][j] = hstart[k][3][j];
01284          hstart[k][0][j] =   hstart[k][nx-1][j];
01285          hstart[k][1][j] =   hstart[k][nx][j];
01286          hend[k][nx+1][j] = hend[k][2][j];
01287          hend[k][nx+2][j] = hend[k][3][j];
01288          hend[k][0][j] =   hend[k][nx-1][j];
01289          hend[k][1][j] =   hend[k][nx][j];
01290      }
01291  }
01292 
01293 //      meridional re-entrance
01294     for (i=2;i<=nx;i++) {
01295       ii = 363 - i;
01296       for (k=0;k<NZ;k++) {
01297         h[k][ii][ny+1] = h[k][i][ny];
01298         h[k][ii][ny+2]   = h[k][i][ny-1];
01299         hstart[k][ii][ny+1] = hstart[k][i][ny];
01300         hstart[k][ii][ny+2] = hstart[k][i][ny-1];
01301         hend[k][ii][ny+1] = hend[k][i][ny];
01302         hend[k][ii][ny+2] = hend[k][i][ny-1];   
01303       }
01304     }
01305 
01306     close_file(&cdfid,&file);
01307 }
01308 
01309 void read_biotic_bc(int imon,int itts)
01310 {
01311 #ifdef PHOSPHATE
01312 /* Read po4_star_lev from climatology. */
01313 //BX  For changes in the po4 climatology field the number of depth levels 
01314 //BX   in the original field (NZPHOS in init.h) and the values for the depth
01315 //BX   levels in step.c (two locations) must be changed.
01316 
01317   int i,j,k,ii;
01318   int err, cdfid, timeid;
01319   char infile[25], inpath[200];
01320   FILE *file;
01321   int status;
01322 
01323   int woapo4id;
01324 # if defined PROGNOSTIC || defined NITRATE
01325   int woano3id, feid, lightid;
01326 # endif
01327 
01328   size_t start[MAX_NC_VARS];
01329   size_t count[MAX_NC_VARS];
01330 
01331   float*** tmp3d;
01332   int inxt,iprv;
01333   double fact0,fact1,fact2;
01334   float*** tmp3dp;
01335   float*** tmp3dn;
01336   
01337   if (imon==11) {
01338     inxt = 0;
01339     iprv = 10;
01340   } else if (imon==0) {
01341     inxt = 1;
01342     iprv = 11;
01343   } else {
01344     inxt = imon + 1;
01345     iprv = imon - 1;
01346   }
01347 //  calculate weight factors for input files - fact0 for previous month, 
01348 //   fact1 for imon, fact2 for next month
01349   fact1 = 0.5 + ((2.0*(double)itts-1.0) / (2.0*(double)NTSTEP));
01350   if (fact1 <= 1.0) {
01351     fact0 = 1.0 - fact1;
01352     fact2 = 0.0;
01353   } else {
01354     fact0 = 0.0;
01355     fact2 = fact1 - 1.0;
01356     fact1 = 2.0 - fact1;
01357   }
01358 
01359   printf("Reading observed PO4 fields: \n"); 
01360 
01361   sprintf(infile,"woalevpo4.nc");
01362   strcpy(inpath, directory);
01363   strcat(inpath, infile);
01364 
01365   printf("Looking for file '%s'.\n",inpath);
01366 
01367   err = open_input_file(inpath,&file,&cdfid,&timeid);
01368   if (err != 0) {
01369       strcat(inpath, ".cdf");
01370       err = open_input_file(inpath,&file,&cdfid,&timeid);
01371       if (err != 0) {
01372           printf("Unable to find world ocean atlas PO4 file.\n");
01373           exit(-73);
01374       }
01375   }
01376 
01377   printf("read po4 month=%i\n",imon);
01378 
01379   if ((status = nc_inq_varid(cdfid, "WOAPO4", &woapo4id)))
01380       ERR(status);
01381 
01382   bzero(start, MAX_NC_VARS * sizeof(long));
01383 
01384   count[0] = 1; 
01385   count[1] = NZPHOS;
01386   count[2] = NYTOT; 
01387   count[3] = NXTOT;
01388 
01389   tmp3d = alloc3d_f(NZPHOS,NYTOT,NXTOT);
01390   start[0] = imon;
01391   if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,woapo4id,start,count,tmp3d[0][0])))
01392       ERR(status);
01393   tmp3dp = alloc3d_f(NZPHOS,NYTOT,NXTOT);
01394   tmp3dn = alloc3d_f(NZPHOS,NYTOT,NXTOT);
01395   start[0] = iprv;
01396   if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,woapo4id,start,count,tmp3dp[0][0])))
01397       ERR(status);
01398   start[0] = inxt;
01399   if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,woapo4id,start,count,tmp3dn[0][0])))
01400       ERR(status);
01401   close_file(&cdfid,&file);
01402 
01403   for (k=0;k<NZPHOS;k++)
01404       for (i=0;i<NXTOT;i++)
01405           for (j=0;j<NYTOT;j++)
01406               po4_star_lev[k][i+2][j+2]= 1e-3 * (fact1 * tmp3d[k][j][i] +
01407                      fact0 * tmp3dp[k][j][i] + fact2 * tmp3dn[k][j][i]);
01408 //      zonal re-entrance
01409 // for (k=0;k<NZ;k++) {
01410   for (k=0;k<NZPHOS;k++) {
01411     for (j=0;j<=NYMEM-1;j++) {
01412       po4_star_lev[k][nx+1][j] = po4_star_lev[k][2][j];
01413       po4_star_lev[k][nx+2][j] = po4_star_lev[k][3][j];
01414       po4_star_lev[k][0][j] =   po4_star_lev[k][nx-1][j];
01415       po4_star_lev[k][1][j] =   po4_star_lev[k][nx][j];
01416     }
01417   }
01418   //      meridional re-entrance
01419   for (i=2;i<=nx;i++) {
01420     ii = 363 - i;
01421     //      for (k=0;k<NZ;k++) {
01422     for (k=0;k<NZPHOS;k++) {
01423       po4_star_lev[k][ii][ny+1] = po4_star_lev[k][i][ny];
01424       po4_star_lev[k][ii][ny+2] = po4_star_lev[k][i][ny-1];     
01425     }
01426   }
01427 # ifdef NITRATE
01428   printf("Reading observed NO3 fields: \n"); 
01429   sprintf(infile,"woalevno3.nc");
01430   strcpy(inpath, directory);
01431   strcat(inpath, infile);
01432 
01433   printf("Looking for file '%s'.\n",inpath);
01434 
01435   err = open_input_file(inpath,&file,&cdfid,&timeid);
01436   if (err != 0) {
01437     strcat(inpath, ".cdf");
01438     err = open_input_file(inpath,&file,&cdfid,&timeid);
01439     if (err != 0) {
01440       printf("Unable to find world ocean atlas NO3 file.\n");
01441       exit(-73);
01442     }
01443   }
01444 
01445   printf("read no3 month=%i\n",imon);
01446 
01447   if ((status = nc_inq_varid(cdfid, "nitrate", &woano3id)))
01448       ERR(status);
01449 
01450   bzero(start, MAX_NC_VARS * sizeof(long));
01451 
01452   count[0] = 1; 
01453   count[1] = NZPHOS;
01454   count[2] = NYTOT; 
01455   count[3] = NXTOT;
01456 
01457   //WARN  tmp3d = alloc3d_f(NZPHOS,NYTOT,NXTOT);
01458   start[0] = imon;
01459   if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,woano3id,start,count,tmp3d[0][0])))
01460       ERR(status);
01461   //WARN tmp3dp = alloc3d_f(NZPHOS,NYTOT,NXTOT);
01462   //WARN tmp3dn = alloc3d_f(NZPHOS,NYTOT,NXTOT);
01463   start[0] = iprv;
01464   if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,woano3id,start,count,tmp3dp[0][0])))
01465       ERR(status);
01466   start[0] = inxt;
01467   if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,woano3id,start,count,tmp3dn[0][0])))
01468       ERR(status);
01469   close_file(&cdfid,&file);
01470 
01471   for (k=0;k<NZPHOS;k++)
01472       for (i=0;i<NXTOT;i++)
01473           for (j=0;j<NYTOT;j++)
01474               no3_lev[k][i+2][j+2]= 1e-3 * (fact1 * tmp3d[k][j][i] +
01475                      fact0 * tmp3dp[k][j][i] + fact2 * tmp3dn[k][j][i]);
01476 //      zonal re-entrance
01477 // for (k=0;k<NZ;k++) {
01478   for (k=0;k<NZPHOS;k++) {
01479     for (j=0;j<=NYMEM-1;j++) {
01480       no3_lev[k][nx+1][j] = no3_lev[k][2][j];
01481       no3_lev[k][nx+2][j] = no3_lev[k][3][j];
01482       no3_lev[k][0][j] =   no3_lev[k][nx-1][j];
01483       no3_lev[k][1][j] =   no3_lev[k][nx][j];
01484     }
01485   }
01486   //      meridional re-entrance
01487   for (i=2;i<=nx;i++) {
01488     ii = 363 - i;
01489     //      for (k=0;k<NZ;k++) {
01490     for (k=0;k<NZPHOS;k++) {
01491       no3_lev[k][ii][ny+1] = no3_lev[k][i][ny];
01492       no3_lev[k][ii][ny+2] = no3_lev[k][i][ny-1];       
01493     }
01494   }
01495 # endif /* NITRATE */
01496 
01497 # ifdef PROGNOSTIC
01498   printf("Reading modeled Fe fields: \n"); 
01499 
01500   sprintf(infile,"whoi_fe.nc");
01501   strcpy(inpath, directory);
01502   strcat(inpath, infile);
01503 
01504   printf("Looking for file '%s'.\n",inpath);
01505 
01506   err = open_input_file(inpath,&file,&cdfid,&timeid);
01507   if (err != 0) {
01508       strcat(inpath, ".cdf");
01509       err = open_input_file(inpath,&file,&cdfid,&timeid);
01510       if (err != 0) {
01511           printf("Unable to find model Fe file.\n");
01512           exit(-73);
01513       }
01514   }
01515 
01516   printf("read Fe month=%i\n",imon);
01517 
01518   if ((status = nc_inq_varid(cdfid, "Fe", &feid)))
01519       ERR(status);
01520 
01521   bzero(start, MAX_NC_VARS * sizeof(long));
01522 
01523   count[0] = 1; 
01524   count[1] = NZPHOS;
01525   count[2] = NYTOT; 
01526   count[3] = NXTOT;
01527 
01528   // tmp3d = alloc3d_f(NZPHOS,NYTOT,NXTOT);
01529   start[0] = imon;
01530   if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,feid,start,count,tmp3d[0][0])))
01531       ERR(status);
01532   // tmp3dp = alloc3d_f(NZPHOS,NYTOT,NXTOT);
01533   // tmp3dn = alloc3d_f(NZPHOS,NYTOT,NXTOT);
01534   start[0] = iprv;
01535   if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,feid,start,count,tmp3dp[0][0])))
01536       ERR(status);
01537   start[0] = inxt;
01538   if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,feid,start,count,tmp3dn[0][0])))
01539       ERR(status);
01540   close_file(&cdfid,&file);
01541 
01542   for (k=0;k<NZPHOS;k++)
01543       for (i=0;i<NXTOT;i++)
01544           for (j=0;j<NYTOT;j++)
01545               fe_lev[k][i+2][j+2]= 1e-3 * (fact1 * tmp3d[k][j][i] +
01546                      fact0 * tmp3dp[k][j][i] + fact2 * tmp3dn[k][j][i]);
01547 //      zonal re-entrance
01548 // for (k=0;k<NZ;k++) {
01549   for (k=0;k<NZPHOS;k++) {
01550     for (j=0;j<=NYMEM-1;j++) {
01551       fe_lev[k][nx+1][j] = fe_lev[k][2][j];
01552       fe_lev[k][nx+2][j] = fe_lev[k][3][j];
01553       fe_lev[k][0][j] =   fe_lev[k][nx-1][j];
01554       fe_lev[k][1][j] =   fe_lev[k][nx][j];
01555     }
01556   }
01557 //      meridional re-entrance
01558   for (i=2;i<=nx;i++) {
01559     ii = 363 - i;
01560     //      for (k=0;k<NZ;k++) {
01561     for (k=0;k<NZPHOS;k++) {
01562       fe_lev[k][ii][ny+1] = fe_lev[k][i][ny];
01563         fe_lev[k][ii][ny+2] = fe_lev[k][i][ny-1];       
01564     }
01565   }
01566 
01567   printf("Reading light fields: \n"); 
01568 
01569   sprintf(infile,"isccp_swrad.nc");
01570   strcpy(inpath, directory);
01571   strcat(inpath, infile);
01572 
01573   printf("Looking for file '%s'.\n",inpath);
01574 
01575   err = open_input_file(inpath,&file,&cdfid,&timeid);
01576   if (err != 0) {
01577       strcat(inpath, ".cdf");
01578       err = open_input_file(inpath,&file,&cdfid,&timeid);
01579       if (err != 0) {
01580           printf("Unable to find model sw radiation file.\n");
01581           exit(-73);
01582       }
01583   }
01584 
01585   printf("read light month=%i\n",imon);
01586 
01587   if ((status = nc_inq_varid(cdfid, "isccp_DWN_SRF_clim", &lightid)))
01588       ERR(status);
01589   printf("reading light month, status=%i\n",status);
01590 
01591   bzero(start, MAX_NC_VARS * sizeof(long));
01592 
01593   // the (surface) light field does not have a z dimension
01594   count[0] = 1; 
01595   count[1] = NYTOT; 
01596   count[2] = NXTOT;
01597 
01598   // tmp3d = alloc3d_f(NZPHOS,NYTOT,NXTOT);
01599   start[0] = imon;
01600   if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,lightid,start,count,tmp3d[0][0])))
01601       ERR(status);
01602 
01603   // tmp3dp = alloc3d_f(NZPHOS,NYTOT,NXTOT);
01604   // tmp3dn = alloc3d_f(NZPHOS,NYTOT,NXTOT);
01605   start[0] = iprv;
01606   if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,lightid,start,count,tmp3dp[0][0])))
01607       ERR(status);
01608   start[0] = inxt;
01609   if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,lightid,start,count,tmp3dn[0][0])))
01610       ERR(status);
01611   close_file(&cdfid,&file);
01612 
01613   for (i=0;i<NXTOT;i++)
01614     for (j=0;j<NYTOT;j++)
01615       sfc_swr[i+2][j+2]= fact1 * tmp3d[0][j][i] +
01616         fact0 * tmp3dp[0][j][i] + fact2 * tmp3dn[0][j][i];
01617 //      zonal re-entrance
01618 // for (k=0;k<NZ;k++) {
01619   for (j=0;j<=NYMEM-1;j++) {
01620     sfc_swr[nx+1][j] = sfc_swr[2][j];
01621     sfc_swr[nx+2][j] = sfc_swr[3][j];
01622     sfc_swr[0][j] =   sfc_swr[nx-1][j];
01623     sfc_swr[1][j] =   sfc_swr[nx][j];
01624   }
01625 //      meridional re-entrance
01626   for (i=2;i<=nx;i++) {
01627     ii = 363 - i;
01628     sfc_swr[ii][ny+1] = sfc_swr[i][ny];
01629     sfc_swr[ii][ny+2] = sfc_swr[i][ny-1];       
01630   }
01631 
01632 # endif /* PROGNOSTIC */
01633 
01634   free3d_f(tmp3d, NZPHOS);
01635   free3d_f(tmp3dp, NZPHOS);
01636   free3d_f(tmp3dn, NZPHOS);
01637   close_file(&cdfid,&file);
01638   printf("end read biotic bc for month=%i\n",imon);
01639 #endif /* PHOSPHATE */
01640 }
01641 
01642 #ifdef LEV_OXY
01643 void read_oxy_ic()
01644 {
01645   int i,j,k;
01646   int err, cdfid, timeid;
01647   char infile[25], inpath[200];
01648   FILE *file;
01649   int status;
01650 
01651   int levo2id;
01652   
01653   size_t start[MAX_NC_VARS];
01654   size_t count[MAX_NC_VARS];
01655   
01656   float*** tmp3d;
01657   double*** oxytmp;
01658 
01659   int nzlevitus = NZPHOS;
01660   double depth[NZ][NXMEM][NYMEM];
01661   double po4obsprof[NZPHOS];
01662   double levitus_depths[NZPHOS] = {0, 10, 20, 30, 50, 75, 100, 
01663                                    120, 150, 200, 250, 300, 400, 500, 600,
01664                                    700, 800, 900, 1000, 1100, 1200, 1300, 
01665                                    1400, 1500, 1750, 2000, 2500, 3000, 
01666                                    3500, 4000, 4500, 5000, 5500};
01667 
01668   printf("Reading Levitus O2 climatology: \n"); 
01669 
01670   sprintf(infile,"lev94_o2.nc");
01671   strcpy(inpath, directory);
01672   strcat(inpath, infile);
01673 
01674   printf("Looking for file '%s'.\n",inpath);
01675 
01676   err = open_input_file(inpath,&file,&cdfid,&timeid);
01677   if (err != 0) {
01678       strcat(inpath, ".cdf");
01679       err = open_input_file(inpath,&file,&cdfid,&timeid);
01680       if (err != 0) {
01681           printf("Unable to find Levitus O2 file.\n");
01682           exit(-73);
01683       }
01684   }
01685 
01686   if ((status = nc_inq_varid(cdfid, "LEVO2", &levo2id)))
01687       ERR(status);
01688 
01689   bzero(start, MAX_NC_VARS * sizeof(long));
01690 
01691   count[0] = 1; 
01692   count[1] = NZPHOS;
01693   count[2] = NYTOT; 
01694   count[3] = NXTOT;
01695 
01696   tmp3d = alloc3d_f(NZPHOS,NYTOT,NXTOT);
01697   oxytmp = alloc3d(NZPHOS,NXMEM,NYMEM);
01698 
01699   start[0] = 0;
01700 
01701   if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,levo2id,start,count,tmp3d[0][0])))
01702         ERR(status);
01703 
01704   for (k=0;k<NZPHOS;k++) {
01705     for (i=0;i<NXTOT;i++) {
01706       for (j=0;j<NYTOT;j++) {
01707         oxytmp[k][i+2][j+2]= tmp3d[k][j][i]*1.e-3;
01708       }
01709     }
01710   }
01711 //  temporary bug fix for northern-most row (j=211)
01712   for (i=2;i<NXMEM;i++) {
01713       for (k=0;k<NZPHOS;k++) {
01714           oxytmp[k][i][211] = oxytmp[k][i][210];
01715       }
01716   }
01717 
01718   z_depth(h,depth);
01719 
01720   for (i=X1;i<=nx;i++) {
01721       for (j=Y1;j<=ny;j++) {
01722           if (D[i][j]>MINIMUM_DEPTH) {
01723               for (k=0;k<nzlevitus;k++) 
01724                   po4obsprof[k] = oxytmp[k][i][j];
01725               for (k=0;k<NZ;k++) {
01726                   oxy_init[k][i][j] = lin_interp(depth[k][i][j], po4obsprof, 
01727                                                      levitus_depths, 0, nzlevitus);
01728                   if (oxy_init[k][i][j] < 0.e0) oxy_init[k][i][j] = 0.;
01729               }
01730           } else {
01731               for (k=0;k<NZ;k++) {
01732                   oxy_init[k][i][j] = misval;
01733               }
01734           }
01735       }
01736   }
01737 
01738   free3d_f(tmp3d, NZPHOS);
01739   free3d(oxytmp, NZPHOS);
01740   close_file(&cdfid,&file);
01741 }
01742 #endif

01744 #ifdef GLODAP_IC
01745 void read_glodap_ic()
01746 {
01747   int i,j,k;
01748   int err, cdfid, timeid;
01749   char infile[25], inpath[200];
01750   FILE *file;
01751   int status;
01752 
01753   int glodapid;
01754   
01755   size_t start[MAX_NC_VARS];
01756   size_t count[MAX_NC_VARS];
01757   
01758   float*** tmp3d;
01759   double*** dictmp;
01760 
01761 //BX-a need this part for extrapolation on layers 
01762 //BX (po4_obs_layer does not work due to field definition
01763 //BX of oxytmp and oxy_init)
01764   int nzlevitus = NZPHOS;
01765   double depth[NZ][NXMEM][NYMEM];
01766   double po4obsprof[NZPHOS];
01767   double levitus_depths[NZPHOS] = {0, 10, 20, 30, 50, 75, 100, 
01768                                    120, 150, 200, 250, 300, 400, 500, 600,
01769                                    700, 800, 900, 1000, 1100, 1200, 1300, 
01770                                    1400, 1500, 1750, 2000, 2500, 3000, 
01771                                    3500, 4000, 4500, 5000, 5500};
01772 
01773   printf("\nReading GLODAP DIC and Alk climatology: \n"); 
01774 
01775   sprintf(infile,"glodap_ic.nc");
01776   strcpy(inpath, directory);
01777   strcat(inpath, infile);
01778 
01779   printf("Looking for file '%s'.\n",inpath);
01780 
01781   err = open_input_file(inpath,&file,&cdfid,&timeid);
01782   if (err != 0) {
01783       strcat(inpath, ".cdf");
01784       err = open_input_file(inpath,&file,&cdfid,&timeid);
01785       if (err != 0) {
01786           printf("Unable to find GLODAP file.\n");
01787           exit(-73);
01788       }
01789   }
01790 
01791   // start with DIC
01792 
01793   if ((status = nc_inq_varid(cdfid, "DIC", &glodapid)))
01794       ERR(status);
01795 
01796   bzero(start, MAX_NC_VARS * sizeof(long));
01797 
01798   //  count[0] = 1; // no time dimension!
01799   count[0] = NZPHOS;
01800   count[1] = NYTOT; 
01801   count[2] = NXTOT;
01802 
01803   tmp3d = alloc3d_f(NZPHOS,NYTOT,NXTOT);
01804   dictmp = alloc3d(NZPHOS,NXMEM,NYMEM);
01805 
01806   start[0] = 0;
01807 
01808   if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,glodapid,start,count,tmp3d[0][0])))
01809         ERR(status);
01810 
01811   for (k=0;k<NZPHOS;k++) {
01812     for (i=0;i<NXTOT;i++) {
01813       for (j=0;j<NYTOT;j++) {
01814         dictmp[k][i+2][j+2]= tmp3d[k][j][i]*1.e-3;
01815       }
01816     }
01817   }
01818 //BX  temporary bug fix for northern-most row (j=211)
01819   for (i=2;i<NXMEM;i++) {
01820       for (k=0;k<NZPHOS;k++) {
01821           dictmp[k][i][211] = dictmp[k][i][210];
01822       }
01823   }
01824 
01825   //BX  interpolation of GLODAP DIC fields with po4_obs_layer
01826   //BX   does not work - so we need the entire code here
01827   //BX po4_obs_layer(h,oxytmp,oxy_init);
01828 
01829   z_depth(h,depth);
01830 
01831 #ifdef DIC
01832   for (i=X1;i<=nx;i++) {
01833       for (j=Y1;j<=ny;j++) {
01834           if (D[i][j]>MINIMUM_DEPTH) {
01835               for (k=0;k<nzlevitus;k++) 
01836                   po4obsprof[k] = dictmp[k][i][j];
01837               for (k=0;k<NZ;k++) {
01838                   dic_init[k][i][j] = lin_interp(depth[k][i][j], po4obsprof, 
01839                                                      levitus_depths, 0, nzlevitus);
01840                   if (dic_init[k][i][j] < 0.e0) dic_init[k][i][j] = 0.;
01841               }
01842 #ifdef MERGED_ML
01843                 // overwrite the top layers
01844                 k=0;
01845                 dic_init[k][i][j] = lin_interp(((depth[k][i][j]+depth[k+1][i][j])/2.), 
01846                                   po4obsprof, levitus_depths, 0, nzlevitus);
01847                 if (dic_init[k][i][j] < 0.e0) dic_init[k][i][j] = 0.;
01848                 dic_init[k+1][i][j]=dic_init[k][i][j];
01849                 k=2;
01850                 dic_init[k][i][j] = lin_interp(((depth[k][i][j]+depth[k+1][i][j])/2.), 
01851                                   po4obsprof, levitus_depths, 0, nzlevitus);
01852                 if (dic_init[k][i][j] < 0.e0) dic_init[k][i][j] = 0.;
01853                 dic_init[k+1][i][j]=dic_init[k][i][j];
01854 #endif
01855           } else {
01856               for (k=0;k<NZ;k++) {
01857                   dic_init[k][i][j] = misval;
01858               }
01859           }
01860       }
01861   }
01862 #endif /* DIC */
01863 
01864           
01865   // Alkalinity is next
01866 
01867   if ((status = nc_inq_varid(cdfid, "TALK", &glodapid)))
01868       ERR(status);
01869 
01870   bzero(start, MAX_NC_VARS * sizeof(long));
01871 
01872   count[0] = NZPHOS;
01873   count[1] = NYTOT; 
01874   count[2] = NXTOT;
01875 
01876   start[0] = 0;
01877 
01878   if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,glodapid,start,count,tmp3d[0][0])))
01879         ERR(status);
01880 
01881 // use dictmp here even if it is for alk
01882 
01883   for (k=0;k<NZPHOS;k++) {
01884     for (i=0;i<NXTOT;i++) {
01885       for (j=0;j<NYTOT;j++) {
01886         dictmp[k][i+2][j+2]= tmp3d[k][j][i]*1.e-3;
01887       }
01888     }
01889   }
01890 //BX  temporary bug fix for northern-most row (j=211)
01891   for (i=2;i<NXMEM;i++) {
01892       for (k=0;k<NZPHOS;k++) {
01893           dictmp[k][i][211] = dictmp[k][i][210];
01894       }
01895   }
01896 
01897   //BX  interpolation of GLODAP TAlk fields with po4_obs_layer
01898   //BX   does not work - so we need the entire code here
01899   //BX po4_obs_layer(h,oxytmp,oxy_init);
01900 
01901   z_depth(h,depth);
01902 
01903 #ifdef DIC
01904   for (i=X1;i<=nx;i++) {
01905       for (j=Y1;j<=ny;j++) {
01906           if (D[i][j]>MINIMUM_DEPTH) {
01907               for (k=0;k<nzlevitus;k++) 
01908                   po4obsprof[k] = dictmp[k][i][j];
01909               for (k=0;k<NZ;k++) {
01910                   alk_init[k][i][j] = lin_interp(depth[k][i][j], po4obsprof, 
01911                                                      levitus_depths, 0, nzlevitus);
01912                   if (alk_init[k][i][j] < 0.e0) alk_init[k][i][j] = 0.;
01913               }
01914 #ifdef MERGED_ML
01915                 // overwrite the top layers
01916                 k=0;
01917                 alk_init[k][i][j] = lin_interp(((depth[k][i][j]+depth[k+1][i][j])/2.), 
01918                                   po4obsprof, levitus_depths, 0, nzlevitus);
01919                 if (alk_init[k][i][j] < 0.e0) alk_init[k][i][j] = 0.;
01920                 alk_init[k+1][i][j]=alk_init[k][i][j];
01921                 k=2;
01922                 alk_init[k][i][j] = lin_interp(((depth[k][i][j]+depth[k+1][i][j])/2.), 
01923                                   po4obsprof, levitus_depths, 0, nzlevitus);
01924                 if (alk_init[k][i][j] < 0.e0) alk_init[k][i][j] = 0.;
01925                 alk_init[k+1][i][j]=alk_init[k][i][j];
01926 #endif
01927           } else {
01928               for (k=0;k<NZ;k++) {
01929                   alk_init[k][i][j] = misval;
01930               }
01931           }
01932       }
01933   }
01934 #endif /* DIC */
01935 
01936   free3d_f(tmp3d, NZPHOS);
01937   free3d(dictmp, NZPHOS);
01938   close_file(&cdfid,&file);
01939 }
01940 #endif
01941 
01942 void read_ts(int imon,int itts)
01943 {
01944 
01945 #ifdef TS_VARIAB
01946 /* Read temperature and salinity from time varying records. */
01947 #else
01948 /* Read temperature and salinity from climatology. */
01949 #endif
01950     int i,j,k;
01951     int err, cdfid, timeid;
01952     char infile[25], inpath[200];
01953     FILE *file;
01954     int status;
01955     
01956     int tempclimid,saltclimid,woasaltid;
01957     
01958     size_t start[MAX_NC_VARS];
01959     size_t count[MAX_NC_VARS];
01960     
01961     float*** tmp3d;
01962     int inxt,iprv;
01963     double fact0,fact1,fact2;
01964     float*** tmp3dp;
01965     float*** tmp3dn;
01966 
01967     if (imon==11) {
01968         inxt = 0;
01969         iprv = 10;
01970     } else if (imon==0) {
01971         inxt = 1;
01972         iprv = 11;
01973     } else {
01974         inxt = imon + 1;
01975         iprv = imon - 1;
01976     }
01977     fact1 = 0.5 + ((2.0*(double)itts-1.0) / (2.0*(double)NTSTEP));
01978     if (fact1 <= 1.0) {
01979         fact0 = 1.0 - fact1;
01980         fact2 = 0.0;
01981     } else {
01982         fact0 = 0.0;
01983         fact2 = fact1 - 1.0;
01984         fact1 = 2.0 - fact1;
01985     }
01986 
01987   printf("Reading temperature and salinity fields: \n"); 
01988 #ifdef TS_VARIAB
01989   sprintf(infile,"T.nc");
01990   strcpy(inpath, directory);
01991   strcat(inpath, infile);
01992 
01993   err = open_input_file(inpath,&file,&cdfid,&timeid);
01994   if (err != 0) {
01995     strcat(inpath, ".cdf");
01996     err = open_input_file(inpath,&file,&cdfid,&timeid);
01997     if (err != 0) {
01998       printf("Unable to find T file.\n");
01999      exit(-73);
02000     }
02001   }
02002     bzero(start, MAX_NC_VARS * sizeof(long));
02003 
02004     count[0] = 1; 
02005     count[1] = NZ;
02006     count[2] = NYTOT; 
02007     count[3] = NXTOT;
02008 
02009   printf("read T month=%i\n",imon);
02010   if ((status = nc_inq_varid(cdfid, "TEMP", &tempclimid)))
02011         ERR(status);
02012     tmp3d  = alloc3d_f(NZ,NYTOT,NXTOT);
02013     tmp3dn = alloc3d_f(NZ,NYTOT,NXTOT);
02014     tmp3dp = alloc3d_f(NZ,NYTOT,NXTOT);
02015 
02016     start[0] = imon;
02017     if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,tempclimid,start,count,tmp3d[0][0])))
02018         ERR(status);
02019     //printf("read_clim UH month=  %i done\n",imon);
02020     start[0] = iprv;
02021     if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,tempclimid,start,count,tmp3dp[0][0])))
02022         ERR(status);
02023     //printf("read_clim UH month=  %i done\n",iprv);
02024     start[0] = inxt;
02025     if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,tempclimid,start,count,tmp3dn[0][0])))
02026         ERR(status);
02027     //printf("read_clim UH month=  %i done\n",inxt);
02028 
02029     for (k=0;k<NZ;k++)
02030         for (i=0;i<NXTOT;i++)
02031             for (j=0;j<NYTOT;j++)
02032                 Temptm[k][i+2][j+2]= fact1 * tmp3d[k][j][i] +
02033                     fact0 * tmp3dp[k][j][i] + fact2 * tmp3dn[k][j][i];
02034 
02035     close_file(&cdfid,&file);  // for temperature
02036 
02037   //NOW SALT
02038 
02039   sprintf(infile,"S.nc");
02040   strcpy(inpath, directory);
02041   strcat(inpath, infile);
02042 
02043   err = open_input_file(inpath,&file,&cdfid,&timeid);
02044   if (err != 0) {
02045     strcat(inpath, ".cdf");
02046     err = open_input_file(inpath,&file,&cdfid,&timeid);
02047     if (err != 0) {
02048       printf("Unable to find S file.\n");
02049      exit(-73);
02050     }
02051   }
02052     bzero(start, MAX_NC_VARS * sizeof(long));
02053 
02054     count[0] = 1; 
02055     count[1] = NZ;
02056     count[2] = NYTOT; 
02057     count[3] = NXTOT;
02058   printf("read S month=%i\n",imon);
02059   if ((status = nc_inq_varid(cdfid, "SALT", &saltclimid)))
02060         ERR(status);
02061 
02062     start[0] = imon;
02063     if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,saltclimid,start,count,tmp3d[0][0])))
02064         ERR(status);
02065     //printf("read_clim UH month=  %i done\n",imon);
02066     start[0] = iprv;
02067     if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,saltclimid,start,count,tmp3dp[0][0])))
02068         ERR(status);
02069     //printf("read_clim UH month=  %i done\n",iprv);
02070     start[0] = inxt;
02071     if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,saltclimid,start,count,tmp3dn[0][0])))
02072         ERR(status);
02073     //printf("read_clim UH month=  %i done\n",inxt);
02074 
02075     for (k=0;k<NZ;k++)
02076         for (i=0;i<NXTOT;i++)
02077             for (j=0;j<NYTOT;j++)
02078                 Salttm[k][i+2][j+2]= fact1 * tmp3d[k][j][i] +
02079                     fact0 * tmp3dp[k][j][i] + fact2 * tmp3dn[k][j][i];
02080 
02081     /*    // do not use salt_woa from file--use SSS from variability file
02082         for (i=0;i<NXTOT;i++) {
02083           for (j=0;j<NYTOT;j++) {
02084             salt_woa[i+2][j+2]= Salttm[0][j][i];
02085           }
02086           } */
02087 
02088     free3d_f(tmp3d, NZ);
02089     free3d_f(tmp3dp, NZ);
02090     free3d_f(tmp3dn, NZ);
02091 
02092     close_file(&cdfid,&file);
02093 
02094 #else // TS_VARIAB
02095   sprintf(infile,"ts.nc");
02096 
02097   strcpy(inpath, directory);
02098   strcat(inpath, infile);
02099 
02100   err = open_input_file(inpath,&file,&cdfid,&timeid);
02101   if (err != 0) {
02102     strcat(inpath, ".cdf");
02103     err = open_input_file(inpath,&file,&cdfid,&timeid);
02104     if (err != 0) {
02105       printf("Unable to find ts file.\n");
02106      exit(-73);
02107     }
02108   }
02109 
02110         printf("read T, S, month=%i\n",imon);
02111 
02112    if ((status = nc_inq_varid(cdfid, "SALTCLIM", &saltclimid)))
02113       ERR(status);
02114    if ((status = nc_inq_varid(cdfid, "TEMPCLIM", &tempclimid)))
02115       ERR(status);
02116 
02117         bzero(start, MAX_NC_VARS * sizeof(long));
02118 
02119         count[0] = 1; 
02120         count[1] = NZ;
02121         count[2] = NYTOT; 
02122         count[3] = NXTOT;
02123 //HF
02124         if (NZ < 24) {
02125             tmp3d = alloc3d_f(24,NYTOT,NXTOT);
02126             tmp3dp = alloc3d_f(24,NYTOT,NXTOT);
02127             tmp3dn = alloc3d_f(24,NYTOT,NXTOT);
02128         } else {
02129             tmp3d = alloc3d_f(NZ,NYTOT,NXTOT);
02130             tmp3dp = alloc3d_f(NZ,NYTOT,NXTOT);
02131             tmp3dn = alloc3d_f(NZ,NYTOT,NXTOT);
02132         }
02133 
02134         start[0] = imon;
02135         if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,saltclimid,start,count,tmp3d[0][0])))
02136             ERR(status);
02137         start[0] = iprv;
02138         if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,saltclimid,start,count,tmp3dp[0][0])))
02139             ERR(status);
02140         start[0] = inxt;
02141         if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,saltclimid,start,count,tmp3dn[0][0])))
02142             ERR(status);
02143 
02144         for (k=0;k<NZ;k++)
02145             for (i=0;i<NXTOT;i++)
02146                 for (j=0;j<NYTOT;j++)
02147                     Salttm[k][i+2][j+2]= fact1 * tmp3d[k][j][i] +
02148                         fact0 * tmp3dp[k][j][i] + fact2 * tmp3dn[k][j][i];
02149 
02150         start[0] = imon;
02151         if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,tempclimid,start,count,tmp3d[0][0])))
02152             ERR(status);
02153         start[0] = iprv;
02154         if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,tempclimid,start,count,tmp3dp[0][0])))
02155             ERR(status);
02156         start[0] = inxt;
02157         if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,tempclimid,start,count,tmp3dn[0][0])))
02158             ERR(status);
02159 
02160         for (k=0;k<NZ;k++)
02161             for (i=0;i<NXTOT;i++)
02162                 for (j=0;j<NYTOT;j++)
02163                     Temptm[k][i+2][j+2]= fact1 * tmp3d[k][j][i] +
02164                         fact0 * tmp3dp[k][j][i] + fact2 * tmp3dn[k][j][i];
02165 
02166         close_file(&cdfid,&file);
02167 
02168   printf("Reading observed SST, SSS: \n"); 
02169   sprintf(infile,"woa01_salt.nc");
02170 
02171   strcpy(inpath, directory);
02172   strcat(inpath, infile);
02173 
02174   err = open_input_file(inpath,&file,&cdfid,&timeid);
02175   if (err != 0) {
02176     strcat(inpath, ".cdf");
02177     err = open_input_file(inpath,&file,&cdfid,&timeid);
02178     if (err != 0) {
02179       printf("Unable to find world ocean atlas salt file.\n");
02180      exit(-73);
02181     }
02182   }
02183 
02184         printf("read salt month=%i\n",imon);
02185 
02186    if ((status = nc_inq_varid(cdfid, "WOASALT", &woasaltid)))
02187       ERR(status);
02188 
02189         bzero(start, MAX_NC_VARS * sizeof(long));
02190 
02191         count[0] = 1; 
02192         count[1] = 24;
02193         count[2] = NYTOT; 
02194         count[3] = NXTOT;
02195 
02196         start[0] = imon;
02197         if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,woasaltid,start,count,tmp3d[0][0])))
02198             ERR(status);
02199         start[0] = iprv;
02200         if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,woasaltid,start,count,tmp3dp[0][0])))
02201             ERR(status);
02202         start[0] = inxt;
02203         if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,woasaltid,start,count,tmp3dn[0][0])))
02204             ERR(status);
02205 
02206         for (i=0;i<NXTOT;i++)
02207             for (j=0;j<NYTOT;j++)
02208                 salt_woa[i+2][j+2]= fact1 * tmp3d[0][j][i] +
02209                         fact0 * tmp3dp[0][j][i] + fact2 * tmp3dn[0][j][i];
02210 //BX  temporary bug fix for northern-most row (j=211)
02211         for (i=2;i<=NXMEM;i++) {
02212           salt_woa[i][211] = salt_woa[i][210];
02213         }
02214         if (NZ < 24) {
02215             free3d_f(tmp3d, 24);
02216             free3d_f(tmp3dp, 24);
02217             free3d_f(tmp3dn, 24);
02218         } else {
02219             free3d_f(tmp3d, NZ);
02220             free3d_f(tmp3dp, NZ);
02221             free3d_f(tmp3dn, NZ);
02222         }
02223 
02224     close_file(&cdfid,&file);
02225 #endif // TS_VARIAB
02226 }

02228 #if defined JO2_SPEC || defined UNIVENT
02229 void read_misc_fields(void)
02230 {
02231   double dayin, readday;
02232   char infile[150], inpath[300];
02233   int cdfid, timeid, err;
02234   int i,j,k,l;
02235   FILE *file;
02236   double work2[NZ][NXMEM][NYMEM];
02237   char input_dir[75],ocmip_input_dir[75];
02238 
02239 //CAD This code will need to be changed for global domain 
02240 //CAD  if vent/circ/bio components of variability are wanted
02241 
02242 #ifdef JO2_SPEC
02243 /* Read jo2_spec_mon from the 12 binary climatological files. */
02244   printf("Reading O2 source-sink fields: \n"); 
02245   strcpy(ocmip_input_dir,"/bird3/cdeutsch/climdata/");
02246   for (l=0;l<12;l++) {
02247     readday = l * 30;
02248     find_input_file("biosms", "", "", readday, ocmip_input_dir, &file, 
02249                     &cdfid,&timeid);
02250     err = read_time(cdfid, file, timeid, 0, &dayin);
02251     read_field(cdfid,file,"jo2spec", NXTOT,NYTOT,NZ,
02252                0,0,0, X1,Y1,0, 0, &work2[0][0][0]);
02253     //HF               0,0,0, 1,1,0, 0, &work2[0][0][0]);
02254     for (j=0;j<=NYMEM-1;j++) {
02255       for (i=0;i<=NXMEM-1;i++) {
02256         for (k=0;k<NZ;k++)
02257           jo2_spec_mon[l][k][i][j]=work2[k][i][j];
02258       }
02259     }
02260   }
02261 #endif
02262 
02263 #ifdef UNIVENT
02264 /* Read aou_spec_mon from the 12 binary climatological files. */
02265   printf("Reading climatological AOU fields: \n"); 
02266   strcpy(ocmip_input_dir,"/bird3/cdeutsch/climdata/");
02267   for (l=0;l<12;l++) {
02268     readday = l * 30;
02269     find_input_file("biosms", "", "", readday, ocmip_input_dir, &file, 
02270                     &cdfid,&timeid);
02271     err = read_time(cdfid, file, timeid, 0, &dayin);
02272     read_field(cdfid,file,"aouspec", NXTOT,NYTOT,NZ,
02273                0,0,0, X1,Y1,0, 0, &work2[0][0][0]);
02274     //HF               0,0,0, 1,1,0, 0, &work2[0][0][0]);
02275     for (j=0;j<=NYMEM-1;j++) {
02276       for (i=0;i<=NXMEM-1;i++) {
02277         for (k=0;k<NZ;k++) 
02278           aou_spec_mon[l][k][i][j]=work2[k][i][j];
02279       }
02280     }
02281   }
02282 #endif
02283 }
