02287 #ifdef RESTART
02288 void read_tracer_init(int imon, char *run_name)
02289 #else
02290 void read_tracer_init(int imon)
02291 #endif
02292 {
02293   int i,j,k;
02294 #if defined RESTART || defined INERT
02295   char infile[150], inpath[300];
02296   int cdfid, timeid, err;
02297   FILE *file;
02298 #endif
02299 
02300 /* open file containing tracer initial conditions */
02301 /* see prep_restart_fields.m to make fields for a restart */
02302   /* for (i=0;i<=NXMEM-1;i++)
02303     for (j=0;j<=NYMEM-1;j++)
02304     printf("begin read_t_init D[%d][%d]=%g\n",i,j,D[i][j]); */
02305 
02306 #ifdef RESTART
02307 
02308 /*   OPEN RESTART FILE    */
02309 
02310   sprintf(infile,"restart.%s.%04i.nc",run_name,imon);
02311   printf("Reading NetCDF restart file '%s'.\n\n",infile);
02312   
02313   err = open_input_file(infile,&file,&cdfid,&timeid);
02314   if (err != 0) {
02315       strcat(infile, ".cdf");
02316       err = open_input_file(infile,&file,&cdfid,&timeid);
02317       if (err != 0) {
02318           printf("Unable to find restart file.\n");
02319           exit(-73);
02320       }
02321   }
02322 
02323 /* Read tracer initial conditions as appropriate. */
02324 
02325 # ifdef ENTRAIN
02326   if (rflags[6]) read_field(cdfid,file,"mn_ea", NXTOT,NYTOT,NZ,
02327              0,0,0, X1,Y1,0, 0, &ea_init[0][0][0]);
02328   //HF             0,0,0, 1,1,0, 0, &ea_init[0][0][0]);
02329   if (rflags[8]) read_field(cdfid,file,"mn_eaml", NXTOT,NYTOT,NZ,
02330              0,0,0, X1,Y1,0, 0, &eaml_init[0][0]);
02331   //HF             0,0,0, 1,1,0, 0, &eaml_init[0][0]);
02332 # endif
02333 
02334 # ifdef SMOOTH_REST
02335   if (rflags[3]) read_field(cdfid,file,"mn_h", NXTOT,NYTOT,NZ,
02336              0,0,0, X1,Y1,0, 0, &h_init[0][0][0]);
02337   //HF             0,0,0, 1,1,0, 0, &h_init[0][0][0]);
02338 # endif
02339 
02340 # ifdef OXYGEN
02341   if (rflags[10]) read_field(cdfid,file,"mn_oxygen", NXTOT,NYTOT,NZ,
02342              0,0,0, X1,Y1,0, 0, &oxy_init[0][0][0]);
02343   //HF             0,0,0, 1,1,0, 0, &oxy_init[0][0][0]);
02344 #  ifdef OXY18
02345   if (rflags[25]) read_field(cdfid,file,"mn_o18", NXTOT,NYTOT,NZ,
02346              0,0,0, X1,Y1,0, 0, &o18_init[0][0][0]);
02347   //HF             0,0,0, 1,1,0, 0, &o18_init[0][0][0]);
02348 #  endif 
02349 # endif
02350 
02351 # ifdef PHOSPHATE
02352   if (rflags[19]) read_field(cdfid,file,"mn_phos", NXTOT,NYTOT,NZ,
02353              0,0,0, X1,Y1,0, 0, &phosphate_init[0][0][0]);
02354   //HF       0,0,0, 1,1,0, 0, &phosphate_init[0][0][0]);
02355   if (rflags[22]) read_field(cdfid,file,"mn_dop", NXTOT,NYTOT,NZ,
02356              0,0,0, X1,Y1,0, 0, &dop_init[0][0][0]);
02357   //HF       0,0,0, 1,1,0, 0, &dop_init[0][0][0]);
02358 # endif
02359   
02360 # ifdef NITRATE
02361   if (rflags[20]) read_field(cdfid,file,"mn_nitr", NXTOT,NYTOT,NZ,
02362              0,0,0, X1,Y1,0, 0, &nitrate_init[0][0][0]);
02363   //HF       0,0,0, 1,1,0, 0, &nitrate_init[0][0][0]);
02364   if (rflags[23]) read_field(cdfid,file,"mn_don", NXTOT,NYTOT,NZ,
02365              0,0,0, X1,Y1,0, 0, &don_init[0][0][0]);
02366   //HF       0,0,0, 1,1,0, 0, &don_init[0][0][0]);
02367 #  ifdef N15_CYCLE
02368   if (rflags[39]) read_field(cdfid,file,"mn_nitr_15n", NXTOT,NYTOT,NZ,
02369              0,0,0, X1,Y1,0, 0, &nitrate_init_15n[0][0][0]);
02370   if (rflags[40]) read_field(cdfid,file,"mn_don_15n", NXTOT,NYTOT,NZ,
02371              0,0,0, X1,Y1,0, 0, &don_init_15n[0][0][0]);
02372 #  endif
02373 # endif /* NITRATE */
02374   
02375 # ifdef INERT
02376   if (rflags[28]) read_field(cdfid,file,"mn_inert1", NXTOT,NYTOT,NZ,
02377              0,0,0, X1,Y1,0, 0, &inert1_init[0][0][0]);
02378   //HF 0,0,0, 1,1,0, 0, &inert1_init[0][0][0]);
02379   if (rflags[29]) read_field(cdfid,file,"mn_inert2", NXTOT,NYTOT,NZ,
02380              0,0,0, X1,Y1,0, 0, &inert2_init[0][0][0]);
02381   //HF             0,0,0, 1,1,0, 0, &inert2_init[0][0][0]);
02382 # endif
02383 
02384 # ifdef AGE  /* all zeros */
02385   if (rflags[9]) read_field(cdfid,file,"mn_age", NXTOT,NYTOT,NZ,
02386              0,0,0, X1,Y1,0, 0, &age_init[0][0][0]);
02387   //HF             0,0,0, 1,1,0, 0, &age_init[0][0][0]);
02388 # endif
02389 
02390 # ifdef DIC
02391    if (rflags[21]) read_field(cdfid,file,"mn_dic", NXTOT,NYTOT,NZ,
02392              0,0,0, X1,Y1,0, 0, &dic_init[0][0][0]);
02393    //HF             0,0,0, 1,1,0, 0, &dic_init[0][0][0]);
02394    if (rflags[31]) read_field(cdfid,file,"mn_alk", NXTOT,NYTOT,NZ,
02395              0,0,0, X1,Y1,0, 0, &alk_init[0][0][0]);
02396    //HF             0,0,0, 1,1,0, 0, &alk_init[0][0][0]);
02397 # endif
02398   
02399 # ifdef CFC  /* all zeros */
02400   if (rflags[14]) read_field(cdfid,file,"mn_cfc11", NXTOT,NYTOT,NZ,
02401              0,0,0, X1,Y1,0, 0, &cfc11_init[0][0][0]);
02402   //HF             0,0,0, 1,1,0, 0, &alk_init[0][0][0]);
02403   if (rflags[15]) read_field(cdfid,file,"mn_cfc12", NXTOT,NYTOT,NZ,
02404              0,0,0, X1,Y1,0, 0, &cfc12_init[0][0][0]);
02405   //HF             0,0,0, 1,1,0, 0, &cfc12_init[0][0][0]);
02406 # endif
02407 // begin ashao
02408 # ifdef SF6  /* all zeros */
02409   if (rflags[50]) read_field(cdfid,file,"mn_cfc11", NXTOT,NYTOT,NZ,
02410              0,0,0, X1,Y1,0, 0, &sf6_init[0][0][0]);
02411   //HF             0,0,0, 1,1,0, 0, &alk_init[0][0][0]);
02412 # endif
02413 // end ashao
02414 
02415 #else  // RESTART
02416 
02417 /* Read tracer initial conditions as appropriate. */
02418 
02419 # ifdef OXYGEN
02420 
02421 #  ifdef LEV_OXY
02422   read_oxy_ic();
02423 #  endif
02424   for (j=0;j<=NYMEM-1;j++) {
02425     for (i=0;i<=NXMEM-1;i++) {
02426         for (k=0;k<=NZ-1;k++) {
02427 #  ifndef LEV_OXY
02428         oxy_init[k][i][j] = 300.e-3;
02429 #  endif
02430 #  ifdef OXY18
02431         o18_init[k][i][j] = oxy_init[k][i][j] * 2.005e-3 * (1.e0 + 24.e-3);
02432 #  endif
02433         }
02434     }
02435   }
02436 # endif
02437 
02438 # ifdef PHOSPHATE
02439   // Try initializing with observed po4
02440   // start for time step "1"
02441     read_biotic_bc(imon,1);
02442 
02443     printf("Initialize 2 for month %i.\n",imon);
02444 
02445     conc_obs_layer(h,po4_star_lev,po4_star_lay);
02446 
02447     printf("Initialize 3 for month %i.\n",imon);
02448     for (i=0;i<=NXMEM-1;i++) {
02449         for (j=0;j<=NYMEM-1;j++) {
02450             if (D[i][j]>MINIMUM_DEPTH) {
02451                 for (k=0;k<=NZ-1;k++)
02452                     phosphate_init[k][i][j]   = po4_star_lay[k][i][j];
02453             } else {
02454                 for (k=0;k<=NZ-1;k++)
02455                     phosphate_init[k][i][j]   = misval;
02456             }
02457         }
02458     }
02459 
02460 
02461     set_darray3d_zero(dop_init, NZ, NXMEM, NYMEM);
02462 # endif /* PHOSPHATE */
02463 
02464 # ifdef NITRATE
02465 // Try initializing with observed po4
02466 
02467     printf("Initialize NO3: Step 2 for month %i.\n",imon);
02468 
02469     conc_obs_layer(h,no3_lev,no3_lay);
02470 
02471     printf("Initialize NO3: Step 3 for month %i.\n",imon);
02472     for (i=0;i<=NXMEM-1;i++) {
02473         for (j=0;j<=NYMEM-1;j++) {
02474           if (D[i][j]>MINIMUM_DEPTH) {
02475             for (k=0;k<=NZ-1;k++)
02476               nitrate_init[k][i][j]   = no3_lay[k][i][j];
02477           } else {
02478             for (k=0;k<=NZ-1;k++)
02479               nitrate_init[k][i][j]   = misval;
02480           }
02481         }
02482     }
02483     printf("nitrate_init=%g\n",nitrate_init[0][55][25]);
02484     set_darray3d_zero(don_init, NZ, NXMEM, NYMEM);
02485 # endif /* NITRATE */
02486 
02487 # ifdef INERT  
02488 #  ifdef INERT_UNUSED
02489   /* use sponge as i.c. for inert1 */
02490   //HF strcpy(inpath,"/bird3/cdeutsch/input/sponge_inert.cdf");
02491   err = open_input_file(inpath,&file,&cdfid,&timeid);
02492   read_field(cdfid,file,"init_argon",NXTOT,NYTOT,NZ, 
02493              0,0,0, X1,Y1,0, 0, &inert1_init[0][0][0]);  
02494   //HF             0,0,0, 1,1,0, 0, &inert1_init[0][0][0]);  
02495   read_field(cdfid,file,"init_temp",NXTOT,NYTOT,NZ, 
02496              0,0,0, X1,Y1,0, 0, &inert2_init[0][0][0]);  
02497   //HF             0,0,0, 1,1,0, 0, &inert2_init[0][0][0]);  
02498   printf("initial inert1 = %g \n", inert1_init[12][40][100]);
02499   printf("initial inert2 = %g \n", inert2_init[12][40][100]);
02500 
02501 #  endif
02502   set_fix_darray3d_zero(inert1_init,NZ);
02503   set_fix_darray3d_zero(inert2_init,NZ);
02504 #endif
02505 
02506 # ifdef AGE  /* all zeros */
02507   for (j=0;j<=NYMEM-1;j++) {
02508     for (i=0;i<=NXMEM-1;i++) {
02509       for (k=0;k<=NZ-1;k++) 
02510         age_init[k][i][j] = 0.0;
02511     }
02512   }
02513 # endif
02514 
02515 
02516 # ifdef DIC
02517 #  ifdef GLODAP_IC
02518   read_glodap_ic();
02519 #  else
02520   //strcpy(inpath,"/home/cdeutsch/OFF/INPUT/init_dic_1deg.cdf");
02521   //err = open_input_file(inpath,&file,&cdfid,&timeid);
02522   //read_field(cdfid,file,"dic", NXTOT,NYTOT,NZ,
02523   //           0,0,0, 1,1,0, 0, &dic_init[0][0][0]);
02524   //strcpy(inpath,"/home/cdeutsch/OFF/INPUT/init_dic_1deg.cdf");
02525   //err = open_input_file(inpath,&file,&cdfid,&timeid);
02526   //read_field(cdfid,file,"dic", NXTOT,NYTOT,NZ,
02527   //           0,0,0, 1,1,0, 0, &alk_init[0][0][0]);
02528   for (k=0;k<=NZ-1;k++) {
02529       for (i=0;i<=NXMEM-1;i++) {
02530           for (j=0;j<=NYMEM-1;j++) {
02531         dic_init[k][i][j] = 2250.e-3;   //  model calculates in mol/m^3 not mmol/m^3
02532         alk_init[k][i][j] = dic_init[k][i][j] + 100.e-3;   //
02533       }
02534     }
02535   }
02536 #  endif
02537 # endif
02538   
02539 # ifdef CFC  /* all zeros */
02540   for (j=0;j<=NYMEM-1;j++) {
02541     for (i=0;i<=NXMEM-1;i++) {
02542       for (k=0;k<=NZ-1;k++) {
02543         cfc11_init[k][i][j] = 0.0;
02544         cfc12_init[k][i][j] = 0.0;
02545       }
02546     }
02547   }
02548 # endif
02549 
02550 // begin ashao
02551 # ifdef SF6  /* all zeros */
02552   for (j=0;j<=NYMEM-1;j++) {
02553     for (i=0;i<=NXMEM-1;i++) {
02554       for (k=0;k<=NZ-1;k++) {
02555         sf6_init[k][i][j] = 0.0;
02556       }
02557     }
02558   }
02559 # endif
02560 // end ashao
02561 #endif  //  RESTART
02562 
02563 }
02564 
02565 void read_restoring(int imon,int itts)
02566 {
02567 #ifdef REST_ARCTIC
02568 # if defined DIC || defined OXYGEN
02569 //BX  Read in CCSM derived climatology for DIC and ALK used for restoring
02570 //BX  It is assumed that the infile has NZPHOS depth levels
02571 //BX  28NOV07 BX
02572     int i,j,k;
02573     int err, cdfid, timeid;
02574     char infile[25], inpath[200];
02575     FILE *file;
02576     int status;
02577     
02578     int dicid,alkid,oxyid;
02579     
02580     size_t start[MAX_NC_VARS];
02581     size_t count[MAX_NC_VARS];
02582     
02583     double var_lev[NZPHOS][NXMEM][NYMEM];
02584     
02585     float*** tmp3d;
02586     int inxt,iprv;
02587     double fact0,fact1,fact2;
02588     float*** tmp3dp;
02589     float*** tmp3dn;
02590 
02591     if (imon==11) {
02592         inxt = 0;
02593         iprv = 10;
02594     } else if (imon==0) {
02595         inxt = 1;
02596         iprv = 11;
02597     } else {
02598         inxt = imon + 1;
02599         iprv = imon - 1;
02600     }
02601     fact1 = 0.5 + ((2.0*(double)itts-1.0) / (2.0*(double)NTSTEP));
02602     if (fact1 <= 1.0) {
02603         fact0 = 1.0 - fact1;
02604         fact2 = 0.0;
02605     } else {
02606         fact0 = 0.0;
02607         fact2 = fact1 - 1.0;
02608         fact1 = 2.0 - fact1;
02609     }
02610    
02611 #  ifdef DIC
02612   printf("Reading CCSM restoring fields for DIC and ALK: \n"); 
02613 #  endif
02614 #  ifdef OXYGEN
02615   printf("Reading CCSM restoring fields for OXYGEN: \n"); 
02616 #  endif
02617 //BX  sprintf(infile,"CCSM_PI_CLIM_DIC_ALK.nc");
02618   sprintf(infile,"CCSM_PI_CLIM_DIC_ALK_O2.nc");
02619 
02620   strcpy(inpath, directory);
02621   strcat(inpath, infile);
02622 
02623   err = open_input_file(inpath,&file,&cdfid,&timeid);
02624   if (err != 0) {
02625       strcat(inpath, ".cdf");
02626       err = open_input_file(inpath,&file,&cdfid,&timeid);
02627       if (err != 0) {
02628           printf("Unable to find CCSM restoring file.\n");
02629           exit(-73);
02630       }
02631   }
02632 
02633   printf("read restoring file month=%i\n",imon);
02634 
02635 /*   Read DIC first - use WOAPO4 field to save memory  */
02636 
02637 #  ifdef DIC
02638   if ((status = nc_inq_varid(cdfid, "RESTDIC", &dicid)))
02639       ERR(status);
02640   if ((status = nc_inq_varid(cdfid, "RESTALK", &alkid)))
02641       ERR(status);
02642 #  endif
02643 #  ifdef OXYGEN
02644   if ((status = nc_inq_varid(cdfid, "RESTO2", &oxyid)))
02645       ERR(status);
02646 #  endif
02647 
02648   bzero(start, MAX_NC_VARS * sizeof(long));
02649 
02650   count[0] = 1; 
02651   count[1] = NZPHOS;
02652   count[2] = NYTOT; 
02653   count[3] = NXTOT;
02654 
02655   tmp3d = alloc3d_f(NZPHOS,NYTOT,NXTOT);
02656   tmp3dp = alloc3d_f(NZPHOS,NYTOT,NXTOT);
02657   tmp3dn = alloc3d_f(NZPHOS,NYTOT,NXTOT);
02658 #  ifdef DIC
02659   start[0] = imon;
02660   if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,dicid,start,count,tmp3d[0][0])))
02661       ERR(status);
02662   start[0] = iprv;
02663   if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,dicid,start,count,tmp3dp[0][0])))
02664       ERR(status);
02665   start[0] = inxt;
02666   if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,dicid,start,count,tmp3dn[0][0])))
02667       ERR(status);
02668 
02669   for (k=0;k<NZPHOS;k++)
02670       for (i=0;i<NXTOT;i++)
02671           for (j=0;j<NYTOT;j++)
02672               var_lev[k][i+2][j+2]= fact1 * tmp3d[k][j][i] +
02673                      fact0 * tmp3dp[k][j][i] + fact2 * tmp3dn[k][j][i];
02674 
02675 //BX  temporary bug fix for northern-most row (j=211)
02676   for (k=0;k<NZPHOS;k++)
02677       for (i=2;i<=NXMEM;i++)
02678           var_lev[k][i][211] = var_lev[k][i][210];
02679 
02680 /*  Regrid restoring fields to model grid 
02681      (conc_obs_layer does regridding not just for po4_star) */
02682     conc_obs_layer(h,var_lev,dic_lay);
02683 
02684   start[0] = imon;
02685   if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,alkid,start,count,tmp3d[0][0])))
02686       ERR(status);
02687   start[0] = iprv;
02688   if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,alkid,start,count,tmp3dp[0][0])))
02689       ERR(status);
02690   start[0] = inxt;
02691   if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,alkid,start,count,tmp3dn[0][0])))
02692       ERR(status);
02693 
02694   for (k=0;k<NZPHOS;k++)
02695       for (i=0;i<NXTOT;i++)
02696           for (j=0;j<NYTOT;j++)
02697               var_lev[k][i+2][j+2]= fact1 * tmp3d[k][j][i] +
02698                      fact0 * tmp3dp[k][j][i] + fact2 * tmp3dn[k][j][i];
02699 
02700 //BX  temporary bug fix for northern-most row (j=211)
02701  for (i=2;i<=NXMEM;i++) {
02702      for (k=0;k<NZPHOS;k++) {
02703          var_lev[k][i][211] = var_lev[k][i][210];
02704      }
02705  }
02706 
02707 /*  Regrid restoring fields to model grid 
02708      (conc_obs_layer does regridding not just for po4_star) */
02709 
02710     conc_obs_layer(h,var_lev,alk_lay);
02711 #  endif    // DIC (and Alk)
02712 
02713 /*  Now Oxygen  */
02714 #  ifdef OXYGEN
02715   start[0] = imon;
02716   if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,oxyid,start,count,tmp3d[0][0])))
02717       ERR(status);
02718   start[0] = iprv;
02719   if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,oxyid,start,count,tmp3dp[0][0])))
02720       ERR(status);
02721   start[0] = inxt;
02722   if ((status = nc_get_vara_float(cdfid,oxyid,start,count,tmp3dn[0][0])))
02723       ERR(status);
02724 
02725   for (k=0;k<NZPHOS;k++)
02726       for (i=0;i<NXTOT;i++)
02727           for (j=0;j<NYTOT;j++)
02728               var_lev[k][i+2][j+2]= fact1 * tmp3d[k][j][i] +
02729                      fact0 * tmp3dp[k][j][i] + fact2 * tmp3dn[k][j][i];
02730 
02731 //BX  temporary bug fix for northern-most row (j=211)
02732  for (i=2;i<=NXMEM;i++) {
02733      for (k=0;k<NZPHOS;k++) {
02734          var_lev[k][i][211] = var_lev[k][i][210];
02735      }
02736  }
02737 
02738 /*  Regrid restoring fields to model grid 
02739      (conc_obs_layer does regridding not just for po4_star) */
02740 
02741     conc_obs_layer(h,var_lev,oxy_lay);
02742 #  endif    // OXYGEN
02743 
02744  close_file(&cdfid,&file);
02745 
02746  free3d_f(tmp3d, NZPHOS);
02747  free3d_f(tmp3dp, NZPHOS);
02748  free3d_f(tmp3dn, NZPHOS);
02749 # endif
02750 #endif
02751 }

02755 
02756 }

02760 {

02771 /* ******************************************************** */
02772 
02773   strcpy(inpath,"/dsk1/suzanne/OFF/input/sponge_1deg.cdf");
02774   err = open_input_file(inpath,&file,&cdfid,&timeid);
02775 
02776 WARNING NOT YET FIXED

02778              0,0,0, 1,1,0, 0, &Idamp[0][0]);

02780              0,0,0, 1,1,0, 0, &sp_e[0][0][0]);

02784              0,0,0, 1,1,0, 0, &sp_age[0][0][0]);
02785 #endif
02786 #ifdef OXYGEN

02788              0,0,0, 1,1,0, 0, &sp_oxygen[0][0][0]);
02789   for (j=0;j<=NYMEM-1;j++) {
02790     for (i=0;i<=NXMEM-1;i++) {
02791       for (k=0;k<=NZ-1;k++) 
02792         sp_oxygen[k][i][j] = ox_init[k][i][j];
02793 #ifdef OXY18
02794         sp_o18[k][i][j] = o18_init[k][i][j];
02795 #endif
02796     }
02797   }
02798 #endif
02799 #ifdef INERT_UNUSED
02800   strcpy(inpath,"/bird3/cdeutsch/OFF/input/sponge_argon.cdf");
02801   err = open_input_file(inpath,&file,&cdfid,&timeid);
02802   read_field(cdfid,file,"init_argon",NXTOT,NYTOT,NZ, 
02803              0,0,0, 1,1,0, 0, &sp_inert1[0][0][0]);  
02804   read_field(cdfid,file,"init_temp",NXTOT,NYTOT,NZ, 
02805              0,0,0, 1,1,0, 0, &sp_inert2[0][0][0]);  
02806 #endif
02807

02812              0,0,0, 1,1,0, 0, &sp_phosphate[0][0][0]);
02813   for (j=0;j<=NYMEM-1;j++) {
02814     for (i=0;i<=NXMEM-1;i++) {
02815       for (k=0;k<=8;k++) 
02816         sp_dop[k][i][j] = 0.2e0;
02817       for (k=9;k<=NZ-1;k++) 
02818         sp_dop[k][i][j] = 0.0e0;

02820   }
02821 #endif

02837 // begin ashao
02838 # if defined(SF6) || defined(CFC)
02839 // Read in tracer year, concentrations, and coefficients for schmidt and solubility from csv file
02840 int read_trac(double sc_coeffs[4], double sol_coeffs[7], int tracyear[MAXRECS], double Ncon[MAXRECS], double Scon[MAXRECS])
02841 {
02842 
02843         int     i,tracrecs;
02844         FILE    *infile;
02845         char    line[200],fname[500];
02846         double  inval;
02847 
02848         printf("Name of tracer data file: \n");
02849         scanf("%s",fname);
02850         printf("%s\n",fname);
02851         infile=fopen(fname,"r");
02852         
02853         fgets(line,sizeof(line),infile);
02854         sscanf(line,"%lf",&inval);
02855         tracrecs=(int) floor(inval);
02856 
02857         
02858         printf("TRACRECS=%d\n",tracrecs);
02859         
02860         fgets(line,sizeof(line),infile);
02861         sscanf(line,"%lf%lf%lf\t%lf",&sc_coeffs[0],&sc_coeffs[1],&sc_coeffs[2],&sc_coeffs[3]);
02862 //      sscanf(line,"%lf",sc_coeffs[0]);
02863         
02864         fgets(line,sizeof(line),infile);
02865         sscanf(line,"%lf%lf%lf%lf%lf%lf%lf",&sol_coeffs[0],&sol_coeffs[1],&sol_coeffs[2],&sol_coeffs[3],&sol_coeffs[4],&sol_coeffs[5],&sol_coeffs[6]);
02866 
02867         for (i=0;i<tracrecs;i++)
02868         {
02869                 fgets(line,sizeof(line),infile);
02870                 sscanf(line,"%lf%lf%lf",&inval,&Ncon[i],&Scon[i]);
02871                 tracyear[i]=(int) floor(inval);
02872         }
02873         
02874         printf("%d\n",tracrecs);
02875         return tracrecs;
02876 
02877 }
02878 # endif
02879 // end ashao
